Key.Original: Nomad, this is Delta-3-4. If you like, we can take you through the city. Over.
Key.Chinese: Nomad，這是 Delta-3-4。你想的話，我們可以帶你穿過城市。完畢。
Key.French: Nomad, ici Delta-3-4. Si vous voulez, on peut vous faire traverser la ville. À vous.
Key.Spanish: Nomad, aquí Delta-3-4. Si lo desean, podemos llevarlos a la ciudad. Cambio.
Key.Italian: Crossroads, qui è Delta-3-4. Se vuoi, possiamo farti attraversare la città. Passo.
Key.Polish: Nomad, tu Delta 3-4. Jeśli chcesz, możemy was przeprowadzić przez miasto. Odbiór.
Key.Russian: Путник, я Дельта 3-4. Если хотите, можем провезти вас через город. Прием.
Key.German: Nomad, hier ist Delta-3-4. Wenn Sie wollen, können wir Sie durch die Stadt bringen. Over.
Key.Czech: Nomáde, tady je Delta 3-4. Pokud chcete, můžeme vás odvézt přes město. Příjem.
Key.English: Nomad, this is Delta-3-4. If you like, we can take you through the city. Over.
Key.Portuguese: Nômade, aqui é Delta-3-4. Se quiser, podemos atravessar a cidade com você. Câmbio.
Key.Korean: 노매드, 여기는 델타 삼넷, 혹시 필요하면 우리가 도시를 가로질러 태워다 주겠다. 이상.
Key.Chinesesimp: Nomad，这里是 Delta-3-4，如果你愿意，我们可以带你穿过城市。完毕，请回复。
Key.Japanese: ノマド、こちらデルタ-3-4。必要であれば、街の向こう側まで輸送する。どうぞ。
Key.Turkish: Nomad, Delta-3-4 konuşuyor. İstersen seni şehre götürebiliriz. Tamam.

Container.name: 46_kalichoriDefend
Container.situation: hq informs kerry about incoming enemy counter attack

Key.Original: Nomad, you've got enemy reinforcements approaching Kappa - inbound from the north east.
Key.Chinese: Nomad，敵方增援接近 Kappa、他們會從東北方推入。
Key.French: Nomad, des renforts ennemis approchent de Kappa par le nord-est.
Key.Spanish: Nomad, los refuerzos enemigos se están aproximando a Kappa. Vienen por el noreste.
Key.Italian: Nomad, sono in arrivo rinforzi nemici verso Kappa. Provengono da nord-est.
Key.Polish: Nomad, wsparcie nieprzyjaciela zbliża się do Kappa z północnego wschodu.
Key.Russian: Путник, на Каппу идут с северо-востока вражеские подкрепления.
Key.German: Nomad, feindliche Verstärkung nähert sich Kappa - aus nordöstlicher Richtung.
Key.Czech: Nomáde, k bodu Kappa se ze severovýchodu blíží nepřátelské posily.
Key.English: Nomad, you've got enemy reinforcements approaching Kappa - inbound from the north east.
Key.Portuguese: Nômade, há reforços inimigos se aproximando de Kappa vindo pelo nordeste.
Key.Korean: 노매드, 적 증원병력이 카파로 접근 중이다. 북동쪽에서 나타날 것이다.
Key.Chinesesimp: Nomad，敌军增援部队正在逼近 Kappa - 从东北方向来。
Key.Japanese: ノマド、敵援軍がカッパに向かっている。北東方面から接近中。
Key.Turkish: Nomad, kuzeydoğudan Kappa’ya yaklaşan düşman takviyeleri var.

Key.Original: You need to halt their offensive. Artillery and CAS is on standby when you need it. Over.
Key.Chinese: 必須阻止他們。砲兵與空中支援隨時準備出擊，等你口令。完畢。
Key.French: Vous devez arrêter leur offensive. L'artillerie et les frappes aériennes n'attendent que votre signal. À vous.
Key.Spanish: Deben contenerlos. La artillería y el AAC están listos para cuando los necesite. Cambio.
Key.Italian: Devi fermare la loro offensiva. Artiglieria e CAS sono in standby quando servono. Passo.
Key.Polish: Musisz zatrzymać tę ofensywę. Artyleria i wsparcie powietrzne czekają w gotowości. Odbiór.
Key.Russian: Нужно остановить их. В вашем распоряжении артиллерия и авиация. Прием.
Key.German: Sie müssen ihre Offensive aufhalten. Artillerie und Luftunterstützung stehen bereit, wenn Sie sie brauchen. Over.
Key.Czech: Musíte zastavit jejich útok. Dělostřelectvo a letecká podpora jsou k dispozici pro případ potřeby. Příjem.
Key.English: You need to halt their offensive. Artillery and CAS is on standby when you need it. Over.
Key.Portuguese: Você precisa deter a ofensiva deles. Artilharia e apoio aéreo aproximado à disposição quando você precisar. Câmbio.
Key.Korean: 놈들의 공세를 막아야 한다. 필요하면 야포와 CAS가 대기 중이니 요청하라. 이상.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你得阻止他们的进攻。如果你需要，火炮和 CAS 待命。
Key.Japanese: 敵の攻撃を退けろ。必要であれば、砲撃部隊とCASを待機させている。どうぞ。
Key.Turkish: Taarruzlarını durdurmalısın. İhtiyacın olduğunda ağır silahlar ve YHD beklemede. Tamam.

Key.Original: Copy that, Crossroads. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，Crossroads。結束通話。
Key.French: Reçu, Crossroads. Terminé.
Key.Spanish: Recibido, Encrucijada. Corto.
Key.Italian: Ricevuto, Crossroads. Chiudo.
Key.Polish: Przyjąłem, Crossroads. Bez odbioru.
Key.Russian: Понял вас, Перекресток. Конец связи.
Key.German: Verstanden, Crossroads. Out.
Key.Czech: Slyším, Křižovatko. Konec.
Key.English: Copy that, Crossroads. Out.
Key.Portuguese: Copiado, Encruzilhada. Desligo.
Key.Korean: 알겠다, 크로스로드. 이상.
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，Crossroads。完毕。
Key.Japanese: 了解、クロスローズ。以上。
Key.Turkish: Anlaşıldı, Crossroads. Tamam.

Container.name: 45_kalichoriSecure
Container.situation: city of kalochori is deemed secure

Key.Original: Good work, Nomad. Stand by.
Key.Chinese: 做得好，Nomad。預備出擊。
Key.French: Beau travail, Nomad. Stand-by.
Key.Spanish: Buen trabajo, Nomad. Esperen.
Key.Italian: Ottimo lavoro, Nomad. In standby.
Key.Polish: Świetnie, Nomad. Czekaj w gotowości.
Key.Russian: Отлично, Путник. Ждите указаний.
Key.German: Gute Arbeit, Nomad. Bleiben Sie in Bereitschaft.
Key.Czech: Dobrá práce, Nomáde. Čekejte.
Key.English: Good work, Nomad. Stand by.
Key.Portuguese: Bom trabalho, Nômade. Fique no aguardo.
Key.Korean: 잘 했다, 노매드. 대기하라.
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得好，Nomad。待命。
Key.Japanese: よくやった、ケリー。待機せよ。
Key.Turkish: İyi iş çıkardın, Nomad. Beklemede kalın.

Key.Original: Crossroads, Kappa is secure. How copy? Over.
Key.Chinese: Crossroads，Kappa 安全了。你收到嗎？完畢。
Key.French: Crossroads, Kappa est sous contrôle. À vous.
Key.Spanish: Encrucijada, Kappa es segura. ¿Me reciben? Cambio.
Key.Italian: Crossroads, Kappa è al sicuro. Mi ricevi? Passo.
Key.Polish: Crossroads, Kappa zabezpieczone. Przyjąłeś? Odbiór.
Key.Russian: Перекресток, Каппа захвачена. Как поняли? Прием.
Key.German: Crossroads, Kappa ist gesichert. Haben Sie verstanden? Over.
Key.Czech: Křižovatko, bod Kappa je zajištěn. Jak nás slyšíte? Příjem.
Key.English: Crossroads, Kappa is secure. How copy? Over.
Key.Portuguese: Encruzilhada, Kappa está seguro. Copiou? Câmbio.
Key.Korean: 크로스로드, 카파 확보 완료. 들었는가? 이상.
Key.Chinesesimp: Crossroads，Kappa 安全了。收到了吗？完毕，请回复。
Key.Japanese: クロスローズ、カッパを確保。聞こえるか？どうぞ。
Key.Turkish: Crossroads, Kappa güvende. Anlaşıldı mı? Tamam.

Container.name: 43_earthQuakeReport
Container.situation: brief discussion between hq and kerry about the earth quake

Key.Original: Crossroads to Nomad, status report. Over.
Key.Chinese: Crossroads 呼叫 Nomad，回報狀況。完畢。
Key.French: Crossroads pour Nomad, au rapport. À vous.
Key.Spanish: Encrucijada a Nomad. Informe de estado. Cambio.
Key.Italian: Crossroads a Nomad, fai rapporto sulla situazione. Passo.
Key.Polish: Crossroads do Nomada, podaj status. Odbiór.
Key.Russian: Путник, я Перекресток. Доложите обстановку. Прием.
Key.German: Crossroads an Nomad, Statusbericht. Over.
Key.Czech: Křižovatka volá Nomáda, hlaste stav. Příjem.
Key.English: Crossroads to Nomad, status report. Over.
Key.Portuguese: Encruzilhada para Nômade, relatório da situação. Câmbio.
Key.Korean: 크로스로드가 노매드에게, 상황보고하라. 이상.
Key.Chinesesimp: Crossroads 呼叫 Nomad，报告状况。完毕，请回复。
Key.Japanese: クロスローズからノマドへ、状況報告を。どうぞ。
Key.Turkish: Crossroads’tan Nomad’a, durum raporu. Tamam.

Key.Original: We don't know - MEDCOM's got no idea what's causing it - according to seismic monitoring, this is abnormal activity.
Key.Chinese: 不清楚－地中海指揮部完全不知道發生的原因。根據地震監測資料，這不是正常的地層活動。
Key.French: Difficile à dire. L'OTAN n'a aucune idée de la source ; d'après les sismologues, il s'agit d'une activité anormale.
Key.Spanish: No lo sabemos. El MEDCOM desconoce las causas. Los informes sísmicos concluyen con que no son naturales.
Key.Italian: Non sappiamo. La MEDCOM non ha idea di cosa lo stia causando. Secondo il monitoraggio sismico, si tratta di attività anomala.
Key.Polish: Nie wiemy, MEDCOM nie ma pojęcia, co jest tego przyczyną. Monitoring sejsmiczny twierdzi, że to nie jest normalna aktywność.
Key.Russian: Мы не знаем. Командование само без понятия. Судя по мониторингу сейсмоактивности, что-то аномальное.
Key.German: Wir wissen es nicht - MEDCOM hat keine Ahnung, wodurch das verursacht wird - laut seismischer Überwachung ist es keine normale Aktivität.
Key.Czech: Nevíme. MEDCOM netuší, co to způsobuje. Podle seismografů jde o abnormální aktivitu.
Key.English: We don't know - MEDCOM's got no idea what's causing it - according to seismic monitoring, this is abnormal activity.
Key.Portuguese: Não sabemos. A MEDCOM não faz ideia do que está causando isso. De acordo com o monitoramento sísmico, a atividade é anormal.
Key.Korean: 우리도 모르겠다. MEDCOM에서도 원인을 모르고 있다. 지진관측에 의하면 뭔가 비정상적인 활동인 것 같다.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们不知道 - MEDCOM 不清楚是什么造成的 - 根据地震监测，这是异常活动。
Key.Japanese: わからん。衛生司令部もこの地震の原因を掴めていない。地震モニタリングによれば、ありえない現象だ。
Key.Turkish: Bilmiyoruz; MEDCOM buna neyin sebep olduğunu bilmiyor; sismik görüntülemeye göre bu bir olağandışı aktivite.

Key.Original: I'm fine. Any more surprises?
Key.Chinese: 沒事。還有別的「驚喜」嗎？
Key.French: Tout va bien. On doit s'attendre à d'autres surprises ?
Key.Spanish: Estoy bien. ¿Alguna otra sorpresa?
Key.Italian: Sto bene. Altre sorprese?
Key.Polish: Wszystko w porządku. Jakieś inne niespodzianki?
Key.Russian: Я в порядке. Еще сюрпризы будут?
Key.German: Ich bin in Ordnung. Gibt's noch weitere Überraschungen?
Key.Czech: Jsem v pořádku. Nějaká další překvapení?
Key.English: I'm fine. Any more surprises?
Key.Portuguese: Estou bem. Mais alguma surpresa?
Key.Korean: 여긴 무사하다. 또 놀랄 일이 있는가?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我没事。还有什么意外吗？
Key.Japanese: こちらはまったく問題なし。まだサプライズが？
Key.Turkish: Ben iyiyim. Başka sürpriz var mı?

Key.Original: This was the strongest one yet. If it carries on like this, we'll have no island to fight for. Out.
Key.Chinese: 這是目前最強的一次。如果再這樣震下去，這座島遲早會沉了。結束通話。
Key.French: C'était la secousse la plus forte. À ce rythme, il n'y aura plus d'île à se partager. Terminé.
Key.Spanish: Este ha sido más fuerte todavía. Como siga así, el trozo de tierra por el que luchamos dejará de existir. Corto.
Key.Italian: Questo è il più forte finora. Se continua così, non ci sarà più nessuna isola per cui combattere. Chiudo.
Key.Polish: To był najsilniejszy wstrząs. Jeśli to potrwa dłużej, to wkrótce nie będzie wyspy, o którą walczymy. Bez odbioru.
Key.Russian: Такого тут еще не было. Если продолжится в том же духе, то и сражаться будет не за что. Конец связи.
Key.German: Das war das stärkste Beben bisher. Wenn das so weitergeht, gibt's bald keine Insel mehr, um die wir kämpfen könnten. Out.
Key.Czech: Tohle bylo zatím nejsilnější. Pokud to tak bude pokračovat, nebude tady žádný ostrov, o který bychom mohli bojovat. Konec.
Key.English: This was the strongest one yet. If it carries on like this, we'll have no island to fight for. Out.
Key.Portuguese: Este último foi o mais forte. Se continuar assim, não vamos ter mais ilha para defender. Desligo.
Key.Korean: 여태까지 중에 가장 강력한 지진이었다. 계속 이런 식으로 가다간 싸울 섬도 없어지게 생겼다. 이상.
Key.Chinesesimp: 这是最强的一次。如果继续这样下去，我们将没有可为之战斗的岛屿了。完毕。
Key.Japanese: さっきのは今までで一番の揺れだった。この調子じゃ、しまいには奪い合ってたはずの島がなくなりかねませんな。以上。
Key.Turkish: Şimdiye kadar en güçlüsü buydu. Böyle devam ederse uğruna savaşacağımız bir ada kalmayacak. Tamam.

Container.name: 42_earthQuake
Container.situation: kerry reacts to earth quake

Key.Original: What the literal fuck..?
Key.Chinese: 這他媽的到底是…？
Key.French: Pute borgne !
Key.Spanish: En serio... ¿Están de coña?
Key.Italian: Che accidenti..?
Key.Polish: Co do kurwy...?
Key.Russian: Какого же черта?..
Key.German: Was zur Hölle ...?
Key.Czech: Co se to kurva...?
Key.English: What the literal fuck..?
Key.Portuguese: Mas que caralho foi isso?
Key.Korean: 이건 또 무슨 일이야...?
Key.Chinesesimp: 这该死的是什么..?
Key.Japanese: まただ…マジで何なんだ…？
Key.Turkish: Bu da ne..?

Container.name: 40_rallyPoint
Container.situation: ground troops rally up and start moving towards kalochori

Key.Original: Acknowledged. Out.
Key.Chinese: 確認。結束通話。
Key.French: Reçu. Terminé.
Key.Spanish: Recibido. Corto.
Key.Italian: Ricevuto. Chiudo.
Key.Polish: Przyjąłem. Bez odbioru.
Key.Russian: Понял вас. Конец связи.
Key.German: Verstanden. Out.
Key.Czech: Rozumím. Konec.
Key.English: Acknowledged. Out.
Key.Portuguese: Entendido. Desligo.
Key.Korean: 알겠다. 이상.
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。完毕。
Key.Japanese: 了解。以上。
Key.Turkish: Onaylandı. Tamam.

Key.Original: Okay, let's move out!
Key.Chinese: 好吧，我們走！
Key.French: OK, en avant !
Key.Spanish: Bien, ¡en marcha!
Key.Italian: Ok, andiamocene!
Key.Polish: Dobrze, ruszamy!
Key.Russian: Так, выдвигаемся!
Key.German: Okay, brechen wir auf!
Key.Czech: Dobrá, pojďme.
Key.English: Okay, let's move out!
Key.Portuguese: Certo, vamos lá!
Key.Korean: 좋아. 이제 이동한다!
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，我们动身吧。
Key.Japanese: オーケー、行くぞ！
Key.Turkish: Tamam, haydi çıkalım!

Key.Original: Crossroads, proceeding to Kappa. Over.
Key.Chinese: Crossroads，我們前往 Kappa。完畢。
Key.French: Crossroads, nous nous dirigeons vers Kappa. À vous.
Key.Spanish: Encrucijada, avancen a Kappa. Cambio.
Key.Italian: Crossroads, avanziamo verso Kappa. Passo.
Key.Polish: Crossroads, udaję się do Kappa. Odbiór.
Key.Russian: Перекресток, мы направляемся к Каппе. Прием.
Key.German: Crossroads, rücken auf Kappa vor. Over.
Key.Czech: Křižovatko, pokračujeme na bod Kappa. Příjem.
Key.English: Crossroads, proceeding to Kappa. Over.
Key.Portuguese: Encruzilhada, a caminho de Kappa. Câmbio.
Key.Korean: 크로스로드, 카파로 진행하겠다. 이상.
Key.Chinesesimp: Crossroads，前往 Kappa。完毕，请回复。
Key.Japanese: クロスローズ、カッパに向かう。どうぞ。
Key.Turkish: Crossroads, Kappa’ya ilerle. Tamam.

Container.name: 35_solarPowerSecure
Container.situation: ground troops secure the power plant

Key.Original: Copy that. Nomad, Charlie-2-3, dig in at Gamma. Set up a defensive perimeter. Hold that position.
Key.Chinese: 收到。Nomad，這是 Charlie-2-3，深入 Gamma。先設下防線。守住那邊。
Key.French: 5/5. Nomad, Charlie-2-3, retranchez-vous au point Gamma. Établissez un périmètre défensif et tenez la position.
Key.Spanish: Recibido. Nomad, Charlie-2-3, atrinchérense en Gamma. Coloquen un perímetro defensivo. Aguanten la posición.
Key.Italian: Ricevuto. Nomad, Charlie-2-3, avanti verso Gamma. Create un perimetro difensivo. Mantenete la posizione.
Key.Polish: Przyjąłem. Nomad, Charlie 2-3, umocnijcie pozycje w Gamma. Przygotujcie linię obronną i utrzymajcie się na stanowiskach.
Key.Russian: Понял вас, Путник. Чарли 2-3, закрепитесь на Гамме. Установите защитный периметр. Держите там позиции.
Key.German: Verstanden. Nomad, Charlie-2-3, bei Gamma eingraben. Richten Sie eine Verteidigungszone ein. Und halten Sie die Position!
Key.Czech: Slyšíme. Nomáde, Charlie 2-3, opevněte se na bodě Gamma. Vytvořte obrannou linii. Udržte tu pozici.
Key.English: Copy that. Nomad, Charlie-2-3, dig in at Gamma. Set up a defensive perimeter. Hold that position.
Key.Portuguese: Copiado. Nômade, Charlie-2-3, reforcem a posição em Gama. Preparem um perímetro defensivo. Mantenham a posição.
Key.Korean: 들었다. 노매드, 찰리 둘삼, 감마에 대기하라. 방어선을 구축하고, 현 위치를 사수하도록.
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。Nomad，Charlie-2-3，防守 Gamma。设置防御带。守住那个阵地。
Key.Japanese: 了解、ノマド。チャーリー-2-3、ガンマに留まり、防衛線を設置せよ。陣地を守れ。
Key.Turkish: Anlaşıldı. Nomad, Charlie-2-3, Gamma’da siper kazın. Bir savunma kuşağı oluşturun. O konumu koruyun.

Key.Original: Delta-3-4, Nomad, rally up and get set to push north east. Out.
Key.Chinese: Delta-3-4、Nomad，會合整隊，準備好了就向東北推進。結束通話。
Key.French: Delta-3-4, Nomad, rassemblez-vous et préparez-vous à une percée vers le nord-est. Terminé.
Key.Spanish: Delta-3-4, Nomad, reúnanse y prepárense para atacar al noreste. Corto.
Key.Italian: Delta-3-4, Nomad, raggruppatevi e preparatevi per spingere a nord-est. Chiudo.
Key.Polish: Delta 3-4, Nomad, przygotujcie się do wyruszenia na północny wschód. Bez odbioru.
Key.Russian: Дельта 3-4, Путник, встречайтесь и готовьтесь пробиваться на северо-восток. Конец связи.
Key.German: Delta-3-4, Nomad, sammeln und zum Vorstoß nach Nordost vorbereiten. Out.
Key.Czech: Delto 3-4, Nomáde, srazte se a připravte se k postupu směrem na severovýchod. Konec.
Key.English: Delta-3-4, Nomad, rally up and get set to push north east. Out.
Key.Portuguese: Delta-3-4, Nômade, encontrem-se e se preparem para avançar no nordeste. Desligo.
Key.Korean: 델타 삼넷, 노매드, 집결 후 북동쪽으로 밀고 들어갈 준비를 하라, 이상.
Key.Chinesesimp: Delta-3-4，Nomad，集合并向东北部推进。完毕。
Key.Japanese: デルタ-3-4、ノマド、結集して北東へ進軍せよ。以上。
Key.Turkish: Delta-3-4, Nomad, toplanın ve kuzeydoğuya saldırmaya hazır olun. Tamam.

Key.Original: Crossroads, Gamma is secure, how copy? Over.
Key.Chinese: Crossroads，Gamma 安全了，收到嗎？完畢。
Key.French: Crossroads, Gamma est sous contrôle, c'est bien reçu ? À vous.
Key.Spanish: Encrucijada, hemos asegurado Gamma, ¿me reciben? Cambio.
Key.Italian: Crossroads, Gamma è sicuro, ricevi? Passo.
Key.Polish: Crossroads, Gamma zabezpieczone. Odbiór.
Key.Russian: Перекресток, Гамма захвачена. Как поняли? Прием.
Key.German: Crossroads, Gamma gesichert. Hören Sie mich? Over.
Key.Czech: Křižovatko, bod Gamma je zajištěn, jak nás slyšíte? Příjem.
Key.English: Crossroads, Gamma is secure, how copy? Over.
Key.Portuguese: Encruzilhada, Gama está seguro. Copiou? Câmbio.
Key.Korean: 크로스로드, 감마를 확보했다. 들었는가? 이상.
Key.Chinesesimp: Crossroads，Gamma 安全了。收到了吗？完毕，请回复。
Key.Japanese: クロスローズ、ガンマを確保、聞こえるか？どうぞ。
Key.Turkish: Crossroads, Gamma güvende, anlaşıldı mı? Tamam.

Container.name: 30_teamsReport
Container.participants: EPC B HQ;EPC B Player;EPC B Leader;EPC B Member;
Container.situation: kerry's team, infantry support and amv support report their actions

Key.Original: Copy that, Nomad.
Key.Chinese: 收到，Nomad。
Key.French: C'est reçu, Crossroads.
Key.Spanish: Recibido, Nomad.
Key.Italian: Ricevuto, Nomad.
Key.Polish: Przyjąłem, Nomad.
Key.Russian: Понял вас, Путник.
Key.German: Verstanden, Nomad.
Key.Czech: Slyšíme, Nomáde.
Key.English: Copy that, Nomad.
Key.Portuguese: Copiado, Nômade.
Key.Korean: 알겠다, 노매드.
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，Nomad。
Key.Japanese: 了解、ノマド。
Key.Turkish: Anlaşıldı, Nomad.

Key.Original: Delta-3-4, Charlie-2-3, SITREP. Over.
Key.Chinese: Delta-3-4、Charlie-2-3，SITREP。完畢。
Key.French: Delta-3-4, Charlie-2-3, au rapport. À vous.
Key.Spanish: Delta-3-4, Charlie-2-3, informe de situación. Cambio.
Key.Italian: Delta-3-4, Charlie-2-3, rapporto. Passo.
Key.Polish: Delta 3-4, Charlie 2-3, raport. Odbiór.
Key.Russian: Дельта 3-4, Чарли 2-3, доложите обстановку. Прием.
Key.German: Delta-3-4 , Charlie-2-3, Statusbericht! Over.
Key.Czech: Delto 3-4, Charlie 2-3, hlaste situaci. Příjem.
Key.English: Delta-3-4, Charlie-2-3, SITREP. Over.
Key.Portuguese: Delta-3-4, Charlie-2-3, relatório da situação. Câmbio.
Key.Korean: 델타 삼넷, 찰리 둘삼, 상황보고하라. 이상.
Key.Chinesesimp: Delta-3-4，Charlie-2-3，情况报告。完毕，请回复。
Key.Japanese: デルタ-3-4、チャーリー-2-3、状況を報告せよ。どうぞ。
Key.Turkish: Delta-3-4, Charlie-2-3, SITREP. Tamam.

Key.Original: Crossroads, Nomad's deployed. Engaging Gamma. Over.
Key.Chinese: Crossroads，Nomad 就定位。開始攻擊 Gamma。完畢。
Key.French: Crossroads, Nomad est déployée. Nous attaquons Gamma. À vous.
Key.Spanish: Encrucijada, Nomad operativo. Atacando Gamma. Cambio.
Key.Italian: Crossroads, Nomad è schierato. Ingaggio di Gamma in corso. Passo.
Key.Polish: Crossroads, Nomad dostarczony na miejsce. Atakuję Gamma. Odbiór.
Key.Russian: Перекресток, Путник высадился. Атакую Гамму. Прием.
Key.German: Crossroads, Nomad wurde abgesetzt. Angriff auf Gamma. Over.
Key.Czech: Křižovatko, Nomád je nasazen. Útočíme na bod Gamma. Příjem.
Key.English: Crossroads, Nomad's deployed. Engaging Gamma. Over.
Key.Portuguese: Encruzilhada, Nômade está posicionado. Enfrentando Gama. Câmbio.
Key.Korean: 크로스로드, 노매드 배치 완료. 감마와 교전하겠다. 이상.
Key.Chinesesimp: Crossroads，Nomad 已部署。正在进攻 Gamma。完毕，请回复。
Key.Japanese: クロスローズ、ノマド配置完了。ガンマに入る。どうぞ。
Key.Turkish: Crossroads, Nomad mevzilendi. Gamma ile çatışılıyor. Tamam.

Key.Original: Charlie-2-3, hold your ground. Nomad, Delta-3-4, support Charlie-2-3 and seize that position. Out.
Key.Chinese: Charlie-2-3，堅守岡位。Nomad、Delta-3-4，支援 Charlie-2-3 並佔領該地區。結束通話。
Key.French: Tenez bon, Charlie-2-3. Nomad, Delta-3-4, appuyez Charlie-2-3 et prenez cette position. Terminé.
Key.Spanish: Charlie-2-3, mantengan la posición. Nomad, Delta-3-4, apoyen a Charlie-2-3 y tomen la posición. Corto.
Key.Italian: Charlie-2-3, mantenete il terreno. Nomad, Delta-3-4, supportate Charlie-2-3 e conquistate la posizione. Chiudo.
Key.Polish: Charlie 2-3, pozostań na pozycji. Nomad, Delta 3-4, udzielić wsparcia Charlie 2-3 i zająć tę pozycję. Bez odbioru.
Key.Russian: Чарли 2-3, удерживайте позицию. Путник, Дельта 3-4, помогите Чарли 2-3 и захватите позицию. Конец связи.
Key.German: Charlie-2-3, halten Sie die Stellung. Nomad, Delta-3-4, unterstützen Sie Charlie-2-3 und besetzen Sie diese Position. Out.
Key.Czech: Charlie 2-3, udržujte pozici. Nomáde, Delto 3-4, poskytněte podporu týmu Charlie 2-3 a získejte tu pozici. Konec.
Key.English: Charlie-2-3, hold your ground. Nomad, Delta-3-4, support Charlie-2-3 and seize that position. Out.
Key.Portuguese: Charlie-2-3, mantenha sua posição. Nômade, Delta-3-4, ofereçam apoio a Charlie-2-3 e capturem a posição. Desligo.
Key.Korean: 찰리 둘삼, 위치를 사수하라. 노매드, 델타 삼넷, 찰리 둘삼을 지원해 해당 위치를 장악하라. 이상.
Key.Chinesesimp: Charlie-2-3，守住阵地。Nomad，Delta-3-4，支援 Charlie-2-3 并夺取那个阵地。完毕。
Key.Japanese: チャーリー-2-3、その場で防戦せよ。ノマド、デルタ-3-4、チャーリー-2-3を援護し、陣地を占拠せよ。以上。
Key.Turkish: Charlie-2-3, yerini koru. Nomad, Delta-3-4, Charlie-2-3’e destek ol ve o konumu ele geçir. Tamam.

Key.Original: Crossroads, this is Delta-3-4, en route to Gamma. Ready to support. Over.
Key.Chinese: Crossroads，這是 Delta-3-4，我們正前往 Gamma 點。隨時準備支援。完畢。
Key.French: Crossroads, ici Delta-3-4, en route pour Gamma. Parés à vous appuyer. À vous.
Key.Spanish: Encrucijada, aquí Delta-3-4, avanzamos a Gamma. Listos para la ayuda. Cambio.
Key.Italian: Crossroads, qui Delta-3-4, in direzione Gamma. Pronti al supporto. Passo.
Key.Polish: Crossroads, tu Delta 3-4, w drodze do Gamma. Gotowy do udzielenia wsparcia. Odbiór.
Key.Russian: Перекресток, я Дельта 3-4. Иду на Гамму. Готов оказать поддержку. Прием.
Key.German: Crossroads, hier ist Delta-3-4, unterwegs zu Gamma. Bereit zur Unterstützung. Over.
Key.Czech: Křižovatko, tady Delta 3-4, jsme na cestě na bod Gamma. Připraveni poskytnout podporu. Příjem.
Key.English: Crossroads, this is Delta-3-4, en route to Gamma. Ready to support. Over.
Key.Portuguese: Encruzilhada, aqui é Delta-3-4. A caminho de Gama. Pronto para oferecer apoio. Câmbio.
Key.Korean: 크로스로드, 여기는 델타 삼넷, 감마로 가는 중. 지원 준비 완료. 이상.
Key.Chinesesimp: Crossroads，这里是 Delta-3-4，在前往 Gamma 的路上。准备支援。完毕，请回复。
Key.Japanese: クロスローズ、こちらデルタ-3-4、現在ガンマに向け移動中。支援準備オーケー。どうぞ。
Key.Turkish: Crossroads, Delta-3-4 konuşuyor, Gamma’ya gidiliyor. Desteğe hazır ol. Tamam.

Key.Original: Charlie-2-3 here. We're engaging Gamma but coming under heavy fire. Unable to proceed. Over.
Key.Chinese: 這是 Charlie-2-3。我們正要攻擊 Gamma，但是遭到敵方強力反抗。無法繼續前進。完畢。
Key.French: Ici Charlie-2-3. Nous attaquons Gamma mais nous sommes sous le feu. Impossible d'avancer. À vous.
Key.Spanish: Aquí Charlie-2-3. Seguimos con el asalto a Gamma, pero recibimos fuego intenso. No podemos continuar. Cambio.
Key.Italian: Charlie-2-3 qui. Stiamo ingaggiando Gamma ma siamo sotto fuoco pesante. Impossibile procedere. Passo.
Key.Polish: Tu Charlie 2-3. Atakujemy Gamma, ale sami znajdujemy się pod ciężkim ostrzałem. Nie możemy ruszyć dalej. Odbiór.
Key.Russian: Говорит Чарли 2-3. Мы атакуем Гамму, но попали под сильный обстрел. Дальше продвигаться не можем. Прием.
Key.German: Hier ist Charlie-2-3. Wir greifen Gamma an, liegen aber unter schwerem Beschuss. Können nicht weiter vorrücken. Over.
Key.Czech: Tady Charlie 2-3. Útočíme na bod Gamma, ale ocitli jsme se pod těžkou palbou. Nemůžeme postupovat. Příjem.
Key.English: Charlie-2-3 here. We're engaging Gamma but coming under heavy fire. Unable to proceed. Over.
Key.Portuguese: Charlie-2-3 aqui. Estamos enfrentando Gama, mas sob fogo pesado. Não podemos prosseguir. Câmbio.
Key.Korean: 여기는 찰리 둘삼, 감마와 교전 중이지만 거센 공격을 받고 있다. 더 이상 진행이 불가하다. 이상.
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是 Charlie-2-3。我们在进攻 Gamma，但遭到猛烈炮火攻击。无法前进。完毕，请回复。
Key.Japanese: こちらチャーリー-2-3。現在ガンマだが、敵の集中砲火を浴びている。身動きがとれない。どうぞ。
Key.Turkish: Charlie-2-3 konuşuyor. Gamma ile çatışıyoruz ancak ağır ateş altındayız. İlerleyemiyoruz. Tamam.

Container.name: 25_flyOut
Container.situation: insertion pilot informs he is leaving lz after dropping kerry's squad

Key.Original: Troops on the ground! Moving out.
Key.Chinese: 注意地面敵人！準備離開。
Key.French: Troupes au sol ! Déploiement.
Key.Spanish: ¡Unidades terrestres! Muévanse.
Key.Italian: Truppe a terra! Ce ne andiamo.
Key.Polish: Żołnierze dostarczeni! Ruszam.
Key.Russian: Бойцы высажены! Улетаю.
Key.German: Truppen am Boden! Wir rücken ab.
Key.Czech: Jednotky na zemi! Přesouváme se.
Key.English: Troops on the ground! Moving out.
Key.Portuguese: Tropas em terra! Estou saindo.
Key.Korean: 병력 배치 완료! 이탈하겠다.
Key.Chinesesimp: 部队下到地面！出去！
Key.Japanese: 部隊を地上へ送り届けた！これより離脱する。
Key.Turkish: Birlikler karada! Dışarı çıkıyoruz.

Container.name: 20_flyInTouchDownGroup
Container.situation: kerry orders his team to disembark

Key.Original: Everyone, out of the chopper, go!
Key.Chinese: 下直升機了，行動！
Key.French: Tout le monde à terre, exécution !
Key.Spanish: Que todos salgan del helicóptero, ¡venga!
Key.Italian: Tutti: fuori dall'elicottero, via!
Key.Polish: Wszyscy mają opuścić śmigłowiec, szybko!
Key.Russian: Выходим из вертолета, быстро!
Key.German: Alle raus aus dem Helikopter, los!
Key.Czech: Všichni, vystupovat, jdeme!
Key.English: Everyone, out of the chopper, go!
Key.Portuguese: Homens, saiam do helicóptero! Agora!
Key.Korean: 전원, 헬기에서 내린다! 실시!
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有人，离开直升机，快！
Key.Japanese: 全員、ヘリを出ろ、急げ！
Key.Turkish: Millet, chopper’dan inin, haydi!

Container.name: 15_flyInTouchDown
Container.situation: insertion pilot informs squad that the chopper has landed and it is safe to disembark

Key.Original: Touch down! Go, go, go!
Key.Chinese: 著陸！衝、衝、衝！
Key.French: Vous pouvez descendre ! Go, go, go !
Key.Spanish: ¡Al suelo! ¡Vamos, vamos, vamos!
Key.Italian: Andare! Avanti, avanti!
Key.Polish: Na ziemi! Ruszać się!
Key.Russian: Есть касание! Пошли!
Key.German: Touchdown! Los, los, los!
Key.Czech: Přistáli jsme! Pohyb, pohyb, pohyb!
Key.English: Touch down! Go, go, go!
Key.Portuguese: Pousamos! Rápido, rápido!
Key.Korean: 착지했다! 내려, 내려!
Key.Chinesesimp: 着陆！走！走！走！
Key.Japanese: 着陸！行け、さあ早く！
Key.Turkish: Yere inin! Haydi, haydi, haydi!

Container.name: 12_doorGunnerEngages
Container.situation: insertion chopper detects enemy when landing

Key.Original: Contact, left flank! Free to engage!
Key.Chinese: 接敵、左側翼！自由發動攻擊！
Key.French: Contact, flanc gauche ! Feu à volonté !
Key.Spanish: ¡Contacto, flanco izquierdo! ¡Permiso para disparar!
Key.Italian: Contatto, fianco sinistro! Ingaggiare!
Key.Polish: Kontakt z lewej strony! Atakować!
Key.Russian: Слева враги! В атаку!
Key.German: Kontakt, linke Flanke! Feuer frei!
Key.Czech: Kontakt na levém křídle! Útočte podle potřeby!
Key.English: Contact, left flank! Free to engage!
Key.Portuguese: Contato, flanco esquerdo! Livres para combater!
Key.Korean: 좌측에 적 출현! 교전해도 좋다!
Key.Chinesesimp: 遇敌，左翼！可以开火！
Key.Japanese: 敵と接触、左翼！自由に応戦可能！
Key.Turkish: Sol kanattan temas var! Nişan serbest!

Container.name: 10_flyInGroup
Container.situation: kerry briefs his team about the landing

Key.Original: Okay, listen up. The LZ's hot. Once we're on the ground, get set for contact.
Key.Chinese: 好吧，聽著。降落區持續交戰。降落以後，立刻做好接敵準備。
Key.French: Écoutez bien : la ZA est contestée. Une fois à terre, tenez-vous prêts à engager.
Key.Spanish: Bien, atención. La zona de aterrizaje está caliente. Cuando estemos en el suelo, prepárense para combatir.
Key.Italian: Ok, ascoltate. La zona di atterraggio è calda. Una volta a terra, preparatevi al contatto.
Key.Polish: Dobrze, słuchajcie. SL nie jest bezpieczna. Po wylądowaniu przygotować się na kontakt.
Key.Russian: Так, слушайте. На площадке враги. Как только сядем, вступайте в бой.
Key.German: Okay, hören Sie zu. Die LZ ist umkämpft. Sobald wir am Boden sind, ist mit Kontakt zu rechnen.
Key.Czech: Dobrá, poslouchejte. Přistávací oblast je horká. Připravte se na kontakt hned po dosednutí.
Key.English: Okay, listen up. The LZ's hot. Once we're on the ground, get set for contact.
Key.Portuguese: Certo, atenção. A zona de pouso está sob ataque. Preparem-se para o contato quando estivermos em terra.
Key.Korean: 좋아, 주목하라. 착륙지대에 적이 있다. 착륙하는 즉시, 교전에 대비하라.
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，听着。着陆区有敌军出没。我们一着陆，马上做好交火准备。
Key.Japanese: オーケー、よく聴いてくれ。LZは危険な状態だ。地上に降りたら、即座に敵に備えろ。
Key.Turkish: Tamam, dinle. İniş Bölgesi sıcak. Karaya indiğimizde, temas için hazır ol.

Container.name: 05_flyInEvent
Container.participants: EPC B HQ;EPC B Player;EPC B Abstract A;
Container.situation: jet team reports they have neutralized enemy aa at the power plant, but lz is still hot

Key.Original: Crossroads, this is Eagle, enemy anti-air at Gamma neutralized. Over.
Key.Chinese: Crossroads，這是 Eagle，已殲滅 Gamma 的敵方防空部隊。完畢。
Key.French: Crossroads, ici Eagle, la DCA ennemie du point Gamma est neutralisée. À vous.
Key.Spanish: Encrucijada, aquí Eagle, antiaéreo enemigo de Gamma eliminado. Cambio.
Key.Italian: Crossroads, qui Eagle, forza antiaerea nemica a Gamma neutralizzata. Passo.
Key.Polish: Crossroads, tu Eagle, obrona przeciwlotnicza w Gamma wyeliminowana. Odbiór.
Key.Russian: Перекресток, я Орел, ПВО на Гамме нейтрализована. Прием.
Key.German: Crossroads, hier Eagle, feindliche Flugabwehr bei Gamma neutralisiert. Over.
Key.Czech: Křižovatko, tady Orel, nepřátelská protiletadlová jednotka v bodě Gamma byla zneškodněna. Příjem.
Key.English: Crossroads, this is Eagle, enemy anti-air at Gamma neutralized. Over.
Key.Portuguese: Encruzilhada, aqui é Águia. Antiaéreo inimigo neutralizado em Gama. Câmbio.
Key.Korean: 크로스로드, 여기는 이글, 감마의 적 대공병력 제압 완료. 이상.
Key.Chinesesimp: Crossroads，这里是 Eagle，已消灭敌军在 Gamma 的防空力量。完毕，请回复。
Key.Japanese: クロスローズ、こちらイーグル、ガンマの敵対空兵器を無力化。どうぞ。
Key.Turkish: Crossroads, Eagle konuşuyor, Gamma’daki düşman hava savunması etkisiz hale getirildi. Tamam.

Key.Original: Copy that, Eagle, RTB.
Key.Chinese: 收到，Eagle，返回基地。
Key.French: Bien reçu, Eagle, rentrez à la base.
Key.Spanish: Recibido, Eagle, vuelvan a base.
Key.Italian: Ricevuto, Eagle.
Key.Polish: Przyjąłem, Eagle, wracajcie do bazy.
Key.Russian: Понял вас, Орел. Идите на базу.
Key.German: Verstanden, Eagle, Rückkehr zur Basis.
Key.Czech: Slyšíme, Orle, vraťte se na základnu.
Key.English: Copy that, Eagle, RTB.
Key.Portuguese: Copiado, Águia. Volte à base.
Key.Korean: 알겠다, 이글. 귀환하라.
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，Eagle，返回基地。
Key.Japanese: 了解、イーグル、基地へ帰投せよ。
Key.Turkish: Anlaşıldı, Eagle, üsse dön.

Key.Original: Golf-2-1, you're clear for landing. LZ is hot.
Key.Chinese: Golf-2-1，你可以降落了。降落區持續交戰。
Key.French: Golf-2-1, vous pouvez atterrir. Attention, la ZA est contestée.
Key.Spanish: Golf-2-1, ya puede aterrizar. La zona de aterrizaje está que arde.
Key.Italian: Golf-2-1, potete atterrare. La zona di atterraggio è calda.
Key.Polish: Golf 2-1, możecie lądować. SL nie jest bezpieczna.
Key.Russian: Гольф 2-1, разрешаю посадку. На площадке бои.
Key.German: Golf-2-1, Landeerlaubnis erteilt. In der LZ wird gekämpft.
Key.Czech: Golfe 2-1, máte povolení přistát. Přistávací oblast je horká.
Key.English: Golf-2-1, you're clear for landing. LZ is hot.
Key.Portuguese: Golfo-2-1, pouso autorizado. A zona de pouso está sob ataque.
Key.Korean: 골프 둘하나, 착륙을 허가한다. 착륙지대에 적이 있다.
Key.Chinesesimp: Golf-2-1，你可以着陆了。着陆区有敌军出没。
Key.Japanese: ゴルフ-2-1、着陸を許可。LZは危険な状態。
Key.Turkish: Golf-2-1, iniş için uygun. İniş Bölgesi sıcak.

Key.Original: Nomad, get boots on the ground. Push towards the solar station. Secure that position. Over.
Key.Chinese: Nomad，你負責地面上的敵人。朝太陽能發電站前進。守住那邊。完畢。
Key.French: Nomad, débarquez et prenez la centrale solaire. À vous.
Key.Spanish: Nomad, pongan los pies en suelo firme. Continúen el asalto a la estación solar. Aseguren la posición. Cambio.
Key.Italian: Nomad, scendete a terra. Spingete verso la stazione solare. Assicuratevi quella posizione. Passo.
Key.Polish: Nomad, udajcie się w kierunku elektrowni słonecznej. Zabezpieczcie tę pozycję. Odbiór.
Key.Russian: Путник, высаживайтесь. Пробивайтесь к солнечной электростанции. Захватите ее. Прием.
Key.German: Nomad, setzen Sie Einheiten ab! Rücken Sie auf die Solarstation vor. Sichern Sie diese Stellung. Over.
Key.Czech: Nomáde, vystupovat. Postupujte směrem k solární stanici. Zajistěte tu pozici. Příjem.
Key.English: Nomad, get boots on the ground. Push towards the solar station. Secure that position. Over.
Key.Portuguese: Nômade, entre no combate. Avance para a estação solar. Mantenha a posição. Câmbio.
Key.Korean: 노매드, 여기서 내려라. 태양열발전소까지 밀고 들어가도록. 해당 거점을 확보하라. 이상.
Key.Chinesesimp: Nomad，着陆。向太阳能电站推进。夺取那个阵地。完毕，请回复。
Key.Japanese: ノマド、地上に乗り込め。ソーラー発電所に侵入し、確保せよ。どうぞ。
Key.Turkish: Nomad, kara kuvvetlerini muharebe alanına götür. Güneş santraline doğru ilerle. O konumu güvenceye al. Tamam.

Key.Original: Copy that, Crossroads. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，Crossroads。結束通話。
Key.French: Reçu, Crossroads. Terminé.
Key.Spanish: Recibido, Encrucijada. Corto.
Key.Italian: Ricevuto, Crossroads. Chiudo.
Key.Polish: Przyjąłem, Crossroads. Bez odbioru.
Key.Russian: Понял вас, Перекресток. Конец связи.
Key.German: Verstanden, Crossroads. Out.
Key.Czech: Slyším, Křižovatko. Konec.
Key.English: Copy that, Crossroads. Out.
Key.Portuguese: Copiado, Encruzilhada. Desligo.
Key.Korean: 알겠다, 크로스로드. 이상.
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，Crossroads。完毕。
Key.Japanese: 了解、クロスローズ。以上。
Key.Turkish: Anlaşıldı, Crossroads. Tamam.

Container.name: 00_flyIn
Container.situation: insertion pilot warns kerry squad to be ready for landing

Key.Original: Nomad, get set for landing. Sixty seconds.
Key.Chinese: Nomad，準備降落。六十秒。
Key.French: Nomad, préparez-vous à l'atterrissage. 60 s.
Key.Spanish: Nomad, prepárense para aterrizar. Sesenta segundos.
Key.Italian: Nomad, preparatevi all'atterraggio. Sessanta secondi.
Key.Polish: Nomad, przygotuj się do lądowania. Sześćdziesiąt sekund.
Key.Russian: Путник, готовьтесь к посадке. Шестьдесят секунд.
Key.German: Nomad, bereit machen zur Landung! Sechzig Sekunden.
Key.Czech: Nomáde, připravte se na přistání. Šedesát sekund.
Key.English: Nomad, get set for landing. Sixty seconds.
Key.Portuguese: Nômade, prepare-se para pousar. Sessenta segundos.
Key.Korean: 노매드, 착륙 준비하라. 60초 전.
Key.Chinesesimp: Nomad，准备着陆。60 秒。
Key.Japanese: ノマド、着陸に備えろ。60秒後だ。
Key.Turkish: Nomad, iniş için hazırlan. Altmış saniye.

Key.Original: Artillery is now out of ammo
Key.Chinese: 砲兵部隊彈藥短缺
Key.French: L'artillerie n'a plus de munitions
Key.Spanish: La artillería está sin munición
Key.Italian: L'artiglieria ha finito le munizioni
Key.Polish: Artylerii zabrakło amunicji
Key.Russian: У артиллерии закончились боеприпасы
Key.German: Die Artillerie hat nun keine Munition mehr
Key.Czech: Dělostřelectvo již nemá střelivo
Key.English: Artillery is now out of ammo
Key.Portuguese: A artilharia está sem munição
Key.Korean: 포병은 현재 탄약이 떨어졌습니다
Key.Chinesesimp: 火炮目前没有弹药
Key.Japanese: 砲弾切れ
Key.Turkish: Ağır Silahın mühimmatı bitti

Key.Chinese: 人間天堂
Key.French: Le paradis retrouvé
Key.Spanish: En el paraíso
Key.Italian: Paradiso trovato

Key.German: Das gefundene Paradies
Key.Czech: Nalezený ráj

Key.Korean: 낙원을 찾아

Key.Japanese: 楽園の地

Key.Original: Backed into a corner, AAF remnants consolidate for a last-ditch counterattack.
Key.Chinese: 退無可退，AAF 餘黨集合起來，發動最後一波反攻。
Key.French: Acculés, les survivants de l'AAF se remobilisent pour une contre-attaque de la dernière chance.
Key.Spanish: Como un animal acorralado, la AAF congrega el resto de sus fuerzas para un contraataque a la desesperada.
Key.Italian: Costretti in un angolo, ciò che resta dell'AAF si consolida per un ultimo contrattacco.
Key.Polish: Pozostałe siły AAF, przyparte do muru, szykują się do ostatecznego kontrataku.
Key.Russian: Загнанные в угол остатки сил AAF объединяются для последней отчаянной контратаки.
Key.German: In die Ecke gedrängt, konsolidieren sich die verbliebenen AAF-Truppen für einen letzten Gegenangriff.
Key.Czech: Zbytky AAF, které jsou zatlačeny do rohu, organizují poslední zoufalý protiútok.
Key.English: Backed into a corner, AAF remnants consolidate for a last-ditch counterattack.
Key.Portuguese: Totalmente encurralados, a sobra da AAF tentam lançar um último contra-ataque.
Key.Korean: 궁지에 몰린 AAF의 잔당이 필사적인 최후의 역습을 위해 병력을 결집시키고 있습니다.
Key.Chinesesimp: AAF 残部被逼到一个角落，他们重组，准备发起最后反击。
Key.Japanese: 追い詰められたAAFは残存兵力を結集し、最後の反撃に転じようとしている。
Key.Turkish: AAF’den geri kalanlar köşeye sıkıştı ve son bir gayretle karşı saldırıda bulunmak için birleşiyor.

Key.Original: Scouting
Key.Chinese: 偵查
Key.French: Repérage
Key.Spanish: Explorar
Key.Italian: Avanscoperta
Key.Polish: Zwiad
Key.Russian: Разведка
Key.German: Ausspähen
Key.Czech: Průzkum
Key.English: Scouting
Key.Portuguese: Exploração
Key.Korean: 정찰
Key.Chinesesimp: 侦察
Key.Japanese: 偵察
Key.Turkish: Keşif

Key.Original: With %1Paros%2 and %3Kalochori%4 secured, the AAF are in full retreat, forced north to %5Ioannina%6.%7They're in a pinch - maybe looking to buy some time - and intel believes they're regrouping in preparation for a last-ditch counterattack. Command is likely to issue the order to push north within the next few hours.%8Last we heard, negotiations with CSAT have been proceeding unimpeded, though it's unclear exactly how successful they're proving to be. For now, CSAT forces are officially no longer actively participating in AAF operations.
Key.Chinese: 既然我方保住了 %1Paros%2 與 %3Kalochori%4，AAF 全面撤出，被迫退往北方的 %5Ioannina%6。%7情資指出，敵方正在重新整隊，準備發動最後一波反攻，原因可能是為了爭取喘息的時間。接下來幾小時內，指揮部就有可能下令向北推進。%8最近的消息是，與 CSAT 的談判相當順利，但不清楚究竟有多「順利」。目前 CSAT 部隊不再主動加入 AAF 作戰。
Key.French: La prise de %1Paros%2 et %3Kalochori%4 contraint l'AAF à un repli total vers %5Ioannina%6, au nord.%7En mauvaise posture, l'ennemi cherche peut-être à temporiser. Nos renseignements indiquent qu'ils se regroupent pour préparer une contre-attaque de la dernière chance. L'état-major ordonnera sans doute une percée au nord dans les prochaines heures.%8Aux dernières nouvelles, les négociations avec le CSAT progressent, sans que nous sachions si elles vont aboutir. Pour l'instant, les forces du CSAT se sont officiellement retirées des opérations de l'AAF.
Key.Spanish: Una vez aseguradas %1Paros%2 y %3Kalochori%4, la AAF al completo se bate en retirada hacia el norte hasta %5Ioannina%6.%7Están pasando apuros y tal vez intenten ganar tiempo, pero Inteligencia cree que se están reagrupando para planificar un contraataque a la desesperada. Probablemente, el mando dé la orden de continuar hacia el norte de aquí a unas pocas horas.%8Los últimos rumores apuntan a unas negociaciones ininterrumpidas con el CSAT, pero no se sabe a ciencia cierta si están resultando fructíferas. Por ahora, la fuerzas del CSAT han jurado no inmiscuirse en las operaciones de la AAF.
Key.Italian: Con %1Paros%2 e %3Kalochori%4 conquistate, l'AAF è in piena ritirata, spinta a nord verso %5Ioannina%6.%7Sono in difficoltà, forse cercano di conquistare tempo. Secondo le nostre informazioni, si stanno raggruppando in preparazione di un ultimo tentativo di contrattacco. Il comando probabilmente invierà l'ordine di spingere a nord entro le prossime ore.%8Secondo le ultime notizie, i negoziati con la CSAT procedono senza intoppi, tuttavia non è chiaro quanto si stiano dimostrando efficaci. Per ora, le forze CSAT, ufficialmente, non partecipano più attivamente alle operazioni AAF.
Key.Polish: Po zajęciu %1Paros%2 i %3Kalochori%4 siły AAF wycofują się na północ, w kierunku %5Ioanniny%6.%7Znaleźli się w trudnej sytuacji i prawdopodobnie chcą zyskać na czasie. Wywiad uważa, że przegrupowują siły i szykują się do ostatecznego kontrataku. Dowództwo, w ciągu kilku najbliższych godzin, powinno wydać rozkaz natarcia w kierunku północnym.%8Z tego co ostatnio słyszeliśmy, negocjacje z CSAT trwają, jednak na razie nie wiadomo, czy zakończą się sukcesem. Na razie siły CSAT nie biorą oficjalnie udziału w operacjach AAF.
Key.Russian: %1Парос%2 и %3Калохори%4 захвачены, все войска AAF вынужденно отступают на север, к %5Иоаннине%6.%7Они в незавидном положении, вероятно, пытаются выиграть немного времени, и, как полагает разведка, собираются, чтобы начать последнее отчаянное контрнаступление. Командование в ближайшее время вероятно распорядится продолжать натиск на север.%8Насколько нам известно, переговоры с CSAT идут беспрепятственно - но пока неясно, успешно ли они проходят. Сейчас войска CSAT официально уже не принимают активного участия в операциях AAF.
Key.German: Nachdem %1Paros%2 und %3Kalochori%4 gesichert sind, ist die AAF geschlossen auf dem Rückzug und wird nach Norden Richtung %5Ioannina%6 gezwungen.%7Der Feind ist in einer Zwangslage und braucht Zeit. Unseren Informationen zufolge sammelt er sich zu einem letzten Gegenangriff. Das Oberkommando wird den Befehl zum Vorstoß nach Norden wahrscheinlich innerhalb der nächsten Stunden erteilen.%8Die Verhandlungen mit CSAT sind - so zumindest der aktuelle Stand - ungestört weitergegangen, obwohl nach wie vor unklar ist, wie erfolgreich sie letztlich sein werden. Im Moment jedenfalls nehmen die CSAT-Kräfte offiziell nicht länger an AAF-Operationen teil.
Key.Czech: Nyní, když je zajištěn %1Paros%2 a %3Kalochori%4, síly AAF jsou zahnány na ústup a tlačeny na sever do %5Ioanniny%6.%7Jednotky AAF jsou zoufalé, možná se snaží získat nějaký čas. Zpravodajské informace naznačují, že se přeskupují a připravují se na poslední zoufalý protiútok. Velení pravděpodobně do několika hodin vydá rozkaz k postupu na sever.%8Poslední informace říkají, že vyjednávání s CSAT probíhá bez problémů, i když zatím není jasné, jak úspěšné bude. Prozatím platí, že jednotky CSAT se již oficiálně aktivně nezúčastňují operací AAF.
Key.English: With %1Paros%2 and %3Kalochori%4 secured, the AAF are in full retreat, forced north to %5Ioannina%6.%7They're in a pinch - maybe looking to buy some time - and intel believes they're regrouping in preparation for a last-ditch counterattack. Command is likely to issue the order to push north within the next few hours.%8Last we heard, negotiations with CSAT have been proceeding unimpeded, though it's unclear exactly how successful they're proving to be. For now, CSAT forces are officially no longer actively participating in AAF operations.
Key.Portuguese: Com %1Paros%2 e %3Kalochori%4 capturados, a AAF está em retirada completa, seguindo ao norte para %5Ioannina%6.%7Eles estão encurralados, talvez estejam querendo conseguir mais tempo. Segundo a inteligência, eles estão se reagrupando para lançar um último contra-ataque. O comando deve ter a ordem para avançarmos para o norte nas próximas horas.%8A última notícia foi de que as negociações com a CSAT estão correndo bem, mas ainda não temos certeza se vão dar certo. Por ora, é oficial que as forças da CSAT não estão mais participando ativamente das operações da AAF.
Key.Korean: %1파로스%2와 %3칼로호리%4를 확보함으로써, AAF는 %5이오안니나%6 북쪽으로 전면적인 퇴각을 할 수밖에 없게 됐다.%7놈들은 궁지에 몰렸으니 시간이라도 벌어보겠다는 속셈일 테고, 정보부에서는 놈들이 최후의 반격을 준비하러 재집결하는 거라고 믿고 있다. 다음 몇 시간 내로 사령부에서 북쪽으로 진군하라는 명령이 하달될 확률이 높지.%8결과가 어떻게 나올지는 모르겠다만 CSAT와의 협상도 별 다른 문제 없이 잘 진행되고 있다는 소식이다. 현재로써는 CSAT군이 AAF의 작전에 직접 참여하는 경우는 공식적으로 없을 거라는 말이지.
Key.Chinesesimp: %1Paros%2 和 %3Kalochori%4 被夺取之后，AAF 全面撤退，向北推进至%5Ioannina%6。%7他们处于危急关头 - 也许希望赢得一些时间。情报人员相信，他们正在重组，准备发动最后的反攻。指挥官可能在接下来的几小时内发布向北推进的命令。%8我们最近听说，与 CSAT 进行的谈判未受阻碍，不过不清楚谈判的真正成效如何。眼下，CSAT 军队正式不再积极参与 AAF 的行动。
Key.Japanese: 我が軍は%1パロス%2と%3カロコリ%4を占拠。これによりAAFは北部%5ヨアニナ%6に総撤退を余儀なくされた。%7窮地に立たされたAAFは時間稼ぎを狙いつつ、情報によれば合流して最後の反撃に出る構えだ。数時間後には、司令部が北への進軍命令を出すだろう。%8最後に聞いた話では、CSATとの交渉はスムーズに進んでいる。だが、その成果のほどはまだ不明だ。少なくとも今のところ、CSAT部隊は公式にはAAFの作戦に参加していない。
Key.Turkish: %1Paros%2 ve %3Kalochori%4 güvende olduğundan, AAF kuzeyde %5Ioannina%6’ya tam çekilme gerçekleştirmek zorunda kaldı.%7Sıkıştılar, biraz zaman kazanmaya çalışıyor olabilirler, istihbarata göre son bir gayretle karşı saldırıda bulunma hazırlığı içinde tekrar toplanıyorlar. Komuta muhtemelen önümüzdeki birkaç saat içinde kuzeye ilerleme emri verecek.%8Son duyduğumuz, CSAT ile müzakereler engelsiz şekilde devam ediyormuş, ancak tam olarak ne kadar başarılı olacakları belirsiz. Şimdilik, CSAT kuvvetleri artık resmi olarak AAF operasyonlarına aktif şekilde katılmayacak.

Key.Original: Crossroads needs to speak to you. Rendezvous with him.
Key.Chinese: Crossroads 要跟你談談。跟他會面。
Key.French: Crossroads veut vous parler. Retrouvez-le.
Key.Spanish: Encrucijada tiene que hablar con usted. Reúnase con él.
Key.Italian: Crossroads deve parlarti. Datti appuntamento con lui.
Key.Polish: Crossroads musi z tobą porozmawiać. Spotkaj się z nim.
Key.Russian: Перекресток хочет поговорить с вами. Встретьтесь с ним.
Key.German: Crossroads muss mit Ihnen sprechen. Treffen Sie sich mit ihm.
Key.Czech: Křižovatka s vámi potřebuje mluvit. Setkejte se s ním.
Key.English: Crossroads needs to speak to you. Rendezvous with him.
Key.Portuguese: Encruzilhada precisa falar com você. Encontre-se com ele.
Key.Korean: 크로스로드가 귀관과 대화를 하고 싶어 한다. 그와 합류하라.
Key.Chinesesimp: Crossroads 要和你谈谈。与他会合。
Key.Japanese: クロスローズから話があるという。合流せよ。
Key.Turkish: Crossroads’un seninle konuşması gerekiyor. Onunla buluş.

Key.Spanish: Reagrúpese con las fuerzas de la OTAN estacionadas en el %1norte de Paros%2.
Key.Italian: Raggruppati con le forze NATO stazionate %1a nord di Paros%2.
Key.Polish: Dołącz do sił NATO stacjonujących na %1północ od Paros%2.

Key.German: Stoßen Sie zu den NATO-Truppen, die %1nördlich von Paros%2 stationiert sind.
Key.Czech: Přeskupte se se silami NATO dislokovanými na %1sever od Parosu%2.
Key.English: Regroup with NATO forces stationed %1north of Paros%2.
Key.Portuguese: Reagrupe-se com as forças da OTAN estacionadas ao %1norte de Paros%2.
Key.Korean: %1파로스 북쪽%2에 주둔 중인 NATO군과 재집결하라.
Key.Chinesesimp: 与驻守于 %1Paros 北面%2的北约部队重组。
Key.Japanese: %1パロス北%2に駐屯中のNATO部隊と合流せよ。
Key.Turkish: %1Paros’un kuzeyinde%2 konuşlanan NATO kuvvetleriyle tekrar toplan.

Key.Original: Find Miller
Key.Chinese: 尋找 Miller
Key.French: Trouver Miller
Key.Spanish: Busque a Miller
Key.Italian: Trova Miller
Key.Polish: Odszukaj Millera
Key.Russian: Найти Миллера
Key.German: Miller finden
Key.Czech: Najděte Millera
Key.English: Find Miller
Key.Portuguese: Encontre Miller
Key.Korean: 밀러 찾기
Key.Chinesesimp: 找到 Miller
Key.Japanese: ミラーを探す
Key.Turkish: Miller’ı Bul

Key.Original: SEARCH
Key.Chinese: 搜尋
Key.French: FOUILLER
Key.Spanish: BUSCAR
Key.Italian: CERCA
Key.Polish: ODSZUKAJ
Key.Russian: НАЙТИ
Key.German: SUCHEN
Key.Czech: HLEDEJTE
Key.English: SEARCH
Key.Portuguese: PROCURE
Key.Korean: 탐색
Key.Chinesesimp: 搜索
Key.Japanese: 捜索
Key.Turkish: ARA

Key.Original: Once you have the truck, deliver it to %1Miller%2.
Key.Chinese: 一旦卡車得手，將它轉交給 %1Miller%2。
Key.French: Une fois aux commandes du camion, livrez-le à %1Miller%2.
Key.Spanish: Una vez se apodere del camión, entrégueselo a %1Miller%2.
Key.Italian: Una volta che avrai il camion, consegnalo a %1Miller%2.
Key.Polish: Po zdobyciu ciężarówki dostarcz ją %1Millerowi%2.
Key.Russian: Когда грузовик будет у вас, доставьте его к %1Миллеру%2.
Key.German: Sobald Sie den LKW haben, bringen Sie ihn zu %1Miller%2.
Key.Czech: Až budete mít náklaďák, odevzdejte jej %1Millerovi%2.
Key.English: Once you have the truck, deliver it to %1Miller%2.
Key.Portuguese: Quando conseguir o caminhão, entregue-o a %1Miller%2.
Key.Korean: 트럭을 확보했다면, %1밀러%2에게 가져가라.
Key.Chinesesimp: 一旦你得到了卡车，把它交给%1Miller%2。
Key.Japanese: トラックを入手したら、%1ミラー%2のもとに届けろ。
Key.Turkish: Kamyonu ele geçirdiğinde, onu %1Miller%2’a teslim et.

Key.Original: Steal the Truck
Key.Chinese: 竊取卡車
Key.French: Voler le camion
Key.Spanish: Robar el camión
Key.Italian: Ruba il camion
Key.Polish: Ukradnij ciężarówkę
Key.Russian: Украсть грузовик
Key.German: Den LKW stehlen
Key.Czech: Ukradněte náklaďák
Key.English: Steal the Truck
Key.Portuguese: Roube o caminhão
Key.Korean: 트럭 강탈하기
Key.Chinesesimp: 偷卡车
Key.Japanese: トラックを奪取
Key.Turkish: Kamyonu Çal

Key.Original: SEARCH
Key.Chinese: 搜尋
Key.French: FOUILLER
Key.Spanish: BUSCAR
Key.Italian: CERCA
Key.Polish: ODSZUKAJ
Key.Russian: НАЙТИ
Key.German: SUCHEN
Key.Czech: HLEDEJTE
Key.English: SEARCH
Key.Portuguese: PROCURE
Key.Korean: 탐색
Key.Chinesesimp: 搜索
Key.Japanese: 捜索
Key.Turkish: ARA

Key.Original: Lieutenant James claims Miller needs a truck stored somewhere in %1the nearby base%2. Find and deliver it to him.
Key.Chinese: James 中尉聲稱，Miller 需要一台放在%1附近基地%2的卡車。找出卡車，轉交給他。
Key.French: Le lieutenant James prétend que Miller a besoin d'un camion entreposé quelque part dans %1la base voisine%2. Trouvez-le et livrez-le-lui.
Key.Spanish: El teniente James dice que Miller necesita un camión ubicado en alguna parte de %1la base cercana%2. Búsquelo y entrégueselo.
Key.Italian: Il tenente James afferma che Miller ha bisogno di un camion nascosto da qualche parte nella %1base vicina%2. Trovalo e consegnaglielo.
Key.Polish: Porucznik James twierdzi, że Miller potrzebuje ciężarówki znajdującej się gdzieś w okolicach %1pobliskiej bazy%2. Odszukaj ją i dostarcz Millerowi.
Key.Russian: Лейтенант Джеймс говорит, что Миллеру нужен грузовик, стоящий где-то на %1ближайшей базе%2. Найдите грузовик и отгоните его Миллеру.
Key.German: Lieutenant James behauptet, dass Miller einen LKW braucht, der sich irgendwo in der %1Basis in der Nähe%2 befindet. Finden Sie ihn und bringen Sie ihn zu ihm.
Key.Czech: Poručík James tvrdí, že Miller potřebuje náklaďák, který se nachází někde v %1nedaleké základně%2. Najděte jej a odvezte mu jej.
Key.English: Lieutenant James claims Miller needs a truck stored somewhere in %1the nearby base%2. Find and deliver it to him.
Key.Portuguese: O Tenente James alega que Miller precisa de um caminhão que está em algum lugar da %1base próxima%2. Encontre-o e leve até Miller.
Key.Korean: 제임스 중위가 %1근처 기지%2 어딘가에 있는 트럭을 밀러가 필요로 하고 있다고 주장했다. 그걸 찾아서 밀러에게 가져가라.
Key.Chinesesimp: James 中尉称，Miller 需要一辆停在%1附近基地%2里的卡车。找到它，并把它交给他。
Key.Japanese: ジェームズ大尉によれば、ミラーが%1基地近く%2に保管されたトラックを必要としている。探し出し、彼の元に届けろ。
Key.Turkish: Teğmen James, Miller’ın, %1üssün yakınında%2 bir yerlerde saklanan bir kamyona ihtiyacı olduğunu belirtiyor. Onu bul ve teslim et.

Key.Original: Destroy Retreating Forces
Key.Chinese: 摧毀撤退部隊
Key.French: Vaincre les forces qui se replient
Key.Spanish: Destruir las fuerzas que se retiran
Key.Italian: Distruggi le forze in ritirata
Key.Polish: Zniszcz wycofujące się siły
Key.Russian: Уничтожить отступающие войска
Key.German: Truppen auf dem Rückzug vernichten
Key.Czech: Zničte ustupující síly
Key.English: Destroy Retreating Forces
Key.Portuguese: Destrua as forças em retirada
Key.Korean: 퇴각하는 적 병력 궤멸시키기
Key.Chinesesimp: 消灭撤退的部队
Key.Japanese: 撤退部隊を破壊
Key.Turkish: Geri Çekilen Kuvvetleri Yok Et

Key.Original: DESTROY
Key.Chinese: 摧毀
Key.French: DÉTRUIRE
Key.Spanish: DESTRUIR
Key.Italian: DISTRUGGI
Key.Polish: ZNISZCZ
Key.Russian: УНИЧТОЖИТЬ
Key.German: ZERSTÖREN
Key.Czech: ZNIČTE
Key.English: DESTROY
Key.Portuguese: DESTRUA
Key.Korean: 궤멸
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁
Key.Japanese: 破壊
Key.Turkish: YOK ET

Key.Original: The AAF are consolidating at %1Ioannina%2. Use %3Delta 3%4 and %5Golf 4-1%6 to soften them up before sending in %7Echo 2%8.
Key.Chinese: AAF 正轉移陣地到 %1Ioannina%2。先指揮 %3Delta 3%4 與 %5Golf 4-1%6 削弱敵方，之後再派出 %7Echo 2%8。
Key.French: L'AAF consolide ses positions à %1Ioannina%2. Utilisez %3Foxtrot 3%4 et %5Golf 4-1%6 pour les affaiblir avant d'envoyer %7Echo-2%8.
Key.Spanish: La AAF se está congregando en %1Ioannina%2. Utilice a %3Foxtrot-3%4 y %5Golf-4-1%6 para ablandarlos antes de enviar a %7Echo-2%8.
Key.Italian: L'AAF si sta consolidando a %1Ioannina%2. Usa %3Foxtrot 3%4 e %5Golf 4-1%6 per ammorbidirli prima di inviare %7Echo 2%8.
Key.Polish: Siły AAF zbierają się w %1Ioanninie%2. Użyj %3Foxtrota 3%4 i %5Golfa 4-1%6, żeby osłabić nieprzyjaciela, a następnie wyślij %7Echo 2%8.
Key.Russian: AAF собираются в %1Иоаннине%2. Воспользуйтесь %3Фокстротом-3%4 и %5Гольфом 4-1%6, чтобы ослабить их перед отправкой %7Эхо-2%8.
Key.German: Die AAF konsolidiert sich bei %1Ioannina%2. Schwächen Sie sie mit %3Foxtrot 3%4 und %5Golf 4-1%6, bevor Sie %7Echo 2%8 losschicken.
Key.Czech: Síly AAF se shromažďují u %1Ioanniny%2. Použijte %3Deltu 3%4 a %5Golf 4-1%6 k jejich oslabení, než vyšlete tým %7Echo 2%8.
Key.English: The AAF are consolidating at %1Ioannina%2. Use %3Delta 3%4 and %5Golf 4-1%6 to soften them up before sending in %7Echo 2%8.
Key.Portuguese: A AAF está se consolidando em %1Ioanninna%2. Use %3Foxtrot 3%4 e %5Golfo-4-1%6 para enfraquecê-las antes de enviar %7Eco-2%8.
Key.Korean: AAF가 %1이오안니나%2로 집결하고 있다. %3델타 삼%4과 %5골프 넷하나%6를 활용해 %7에코 둘%8을 진입시키기 전에 적을 약화시켜라.
Key.Chinesesimp: AAF 正在 %1Ioannina%2 集结。利用 %3Delta 3%4 和 %5Golf 4-1%6 削弱他们，再派遣 %7Echo 2%8。
Key.Japanese: AAFは%1ヨアニナ%2に結集している。%3フォックストロット-3%4と%5ゴルフ-4-1%6を使い、%7エコー-2%8が向かう前に敵の戦力を削げ。
Key.Turkish: AAF, %1Ioannina%2’da birleşiyor. %7Echo 2%8’yi göndermeden önce güçlerini zayıflatmak için %3Delta 3%4 ve %5Golf 4-1%6’i kullan.

Key.Original: Find James
Key.Chinese: 尋找 James
Key.French: Trouver James
Key.Spanish: Buscar a James
Key.Italian: Trova James
Key.Polish: Odszukaj Jamesa
Key.Russian: Найти Джеймса
Key.German: James finden
Key.Czech: Najděte Jamese
Key.English: Find James
Key.Portuguese: Encontre James
Key.Korean: 제임스 찾기
Key.Chinesesimp: 找到 James
Key.Japanese: ジェームズを探す
Key.Turkish: James’i Bul

Key.Original: SEARCH
Key.Chinese: 搜尋
Key.French: FOUILLER
Key.Spanish: BUSCAR
Key.Italian: CERCA
Key.Polish: ODSZUKAJ
Key.Russian: НАЙТИ
Key.German: SUCHEN
Key.Czech: HLEDEJTE
Key.English: SEARCH
Key.Portuguese: PROCURE
Key.Korean: 탐색
Key.Chinesesimp: 搜索
Key.Japanese: 捜索
Key.Turkish: ARA

Container.name: x05_James_Bypassed
Container.situation: kerry gets in the truck carrying the device before meeting james.

Key.Original: Kerry... Is that you? ...
Key.Chinese: Kerry…是你嗎？…
Key.French: Kerry... C'est vous ?...
Key.Spanish: Kerry... ¿Es usted?
Key.Italian: Kerry... sei tu? ...
Key.Polish: Kerry... Czy to ty?...
Key.Russian: Керри... Это вы?..
Key.German: Kerry ... sind Sie das? ...
Key.Czech: Kerry... To jste vy? ...
Key.English: Kerry... Is that you? ...
Key.Portuguese: Kerry... é você?
Key.Korean: 케리... 거기 너냐?...
Key.Chinesesimp: Kerry...是你吗？...
Key.Japanese: ケリー…ケリーか？…
Key.Turkish: Kerry... Sen misin? ...

Key.Original: Do you think you... Made enough noise, Kerry? ...
Key.Chinese: 你到底…吵夠了沒，Kerry？…
Key.French: Vous pensez avoir... fait assez de raffut, Kerry ?...
Key.Spanish: ¿Cree que ha...? ¿Que ha hecho bastante ruido, Kerry?
Key.Italian: Pensi... di aver fatto abbastanza rumore, Kerry? ...
Key.Polish: Myślisz, że... Narobiłeś hałasu, Kerry?...
Key.Russian: Керри, вы как думаете... Достаточно там было шума?
Key.German: Glauben Sie, Sie haben ... genug Krach gemacht, Kerry? ...
Key.Czech: Myslíte, že jste... Udělal dost velký hluk, Kerry? ...
Key.English: Do you think you... Made enough noise, Kerry? ...
Key.Portuguese: Você acha que... fez barulho suficiente, Kerry?
Key.Korean: 그 정도면... 꽤나 소란을 피웠다고 생각하지 않냐, 케리?...
Key.Chinesesimp: 你觉得你...发出够大的声音了吗，Kerry？...
Key.Japanese: ノイズは十分だろうな…ケリー？…
Key.Turkish: Sence sen... Yeterince gürültü çıkardın mı, Kerry? ...

Key.Original: Take it to Miller... Ruins... Two-Zero-Zero... Two-Zero-Zero...
Key.Chinese: 交給 Miller…廢墟…兩、洞、洞…兩、洞、洞…
Key.French: Apportez ça à Miller... Les ruines... 2-0-0... 2-0-0...
Key.Spanish: Lléveselo a Miller... Ruinas... Dos-cero-cero... Dos-cero-cero...
Key.Italian: Portalo a Miller... Rovine... Due-Zero-Zero... Due-Zero-Zero...
Key.Polish: Zabierz do Millera... Ruiny... Dwa-Zero-Zero... Dwa-Zero-Zero...
Key.Russian: Отгоните к Миллеру... Развалины... Два-ноль-ноль... Два-ноль-ноль...
Key.German: Bringen Sie ihn zu Miller ... Ruinen ... Zwei-Zero-Zero ... Zwei-Zero-Zero ...
Key.Czech: Odvezte to Millerovi... Zříceniny... Dva-nula-nula. Dva-nula-nula.
Key.English: Take it to Miller... Ruins... Two-Zero-Zero... Two-Zero-Zero...
Key.Portuguese: Leve-o para Miller... Ruínas... Dois-zero-zero... Dois-zero-zero...
Key.Korean: 그걸 밀러 대위님한테... 둘공공... 둘공공의... 폐허에 있...
Key.Chinesesimp: 把它带给 Miller...残骸...二-零-零...二-零-零...
Key.Japanese: そいつをミラーの元へ…廃墟だ…2-0-0…2-0-0…
Key.Turkish: Onu Miller’a götür... Harabeler... İki-Sıfır-Sıfır... İki-Sıfır-Sıfır...

Key.Original: Lieutenant! Yeah, it's me. I'm in this... Actually, I don't know what the hell it is. A truck carrying something.
Key.Chinese: 中尉！嗯，是我。我在…說真的，我不知道那是什麼玩意。有輛卡車載著某個東西。
Key.French: Lieutenant ! Oui, c'est moi. Je suis dans... Je ne sais pas dans quoi. Un camion qui transporte quelque chose.
Key.Spanish: ¡Teniente! Sí, soy yo. Estoy en este... Bah, no tengo ni idea de qué cojones es esto. Un camión con algo.
Key.Italian: Tenente! Sì, sono io. Sono in questo... in effetti, non so nemmeno che diavolo sia. Un camion che trasporta qualcosa.
Key.Polish: Poruczniku! Tak, to ja. Jestem w... Prawdę mówiąc, za cholerę nie wiem, co to jest. Ciężarówka przewożąca coś.
Key.Russian: Лейтенант! Да, это я. Я тут в этом... Даже не знаю, что это такое. Грузовик с чем-то.
Key.German: Lieutenant! Ja, ich bin's. Ich bin in diesem ... Eigentlich weiß ich gar nicht, was das hier ist. Ein LKW, der irgendwas transportiert.
Key.Czech: Poručíku. Jo, to jsem já. Sedím v tomhle... Vlastně ani nevím, v čem, zatraceně. Je to náklaďák s něčím.
Key.English: Lieutenant! Yeah, it's me. I'm in this... Actually, I don't know what the hell it is. A truck carrying something.
Key.Portuguese: Tenente! É, sou eu. Estou aqui no... Na verdade, não faço ideia de onde estou. Estou num caminhão carregando algo.
Key.Korean: 중위님! 네, 저 맞습니다. 지금... 사실 이게 대체 다 무슨 일인지도 모르겠네요. 트럭에 뭔가가 실려있어요.
Key.Chinesesimp: 中尉！嗯，是我。我在这个...实际上，我不知道那到底是什么。一辆载着什么东西的卡车。
Key.Japanese: 大尉！ああ、こちらケリー。今こいつに乗って…そもそも、こいつは一体？何か積まれているようだが。
Key.Turkish: Teğmen! Evet, benim. Şunun içindeyim... Aslında, ne halt olduğunu bilmiyorum. Bir şeyler taşıyan bir kamyon.

Key.Original: Forget about that... Kerry... I'm done for...
Key.Chinese: 算了…Kerry…我玩完了…
Key.French: Pas la peine... Kerry... Je suis foutu...
Key.Spanish: Olvídelo... Kerry... Yo ya estoy...
Key.Italian: Lascia perdere... Kerry... ne ho abbastanza...
Key.Polish: Zapomnij o tym... Kerry... Już po mnie...
Key.Russian: Забудьте об этом... Керри... Мне конец...
Key.German: Vergessen Sie das ... Kerry ... Mit mir geht's zu Ende ...
Key.Czech: Na to zapomeňte... Kerry... Já už jsem dobojoval...
Key.English: Forget about that... Kerry... I'm done for...
Key.Portuguese: Deixe isso para lá... Kerry... Já vou esticar as canelas...
Key.Korean: 그건 집어치워... 케리... 난 이미 틀렸어...
Key.Chinesesimp: 算了吧...Kerry...我完蛋了...
Key.Japanese: 俺のことはいい…ケリー…俺はもうダメだ…
Key.Turkish: Unut gitsin... Kerry... Hapı yuttum...

Key.Original: No, not before I come pick you up.
Key.Chinese: 有我來接你，不會的。
Key.French: Non, je passe d'abord vous chercher.
Key.Spanish: No, no siga. Voy a por usted.
Key.Italian: No, non prima che venga a prenderti
Key.Polish: Nie, dopóki cię nie zabiorę.
Key.Russian: Нет, сначала я вас подберу.
Key.German: Nein, vorher hole ich Sie ab.
Key.Czech: Ne, nejdřív vás přijedu vyzvednout.
Key.English: No, not before I come pick you up.
Key.Portuguese: Não, não antes de eu ir aí buscá-lo.
Key.Korean: 아니요, 중위님을 데리러 가겠습니다.
Key.Chinesesimp: 不，别在我去接你之前。
Key.Japanese: ダメだ！今迎えに行く、それまで…
Key.Turkish: Hayır, ben seni almadan önce değil.

Key.Original: Lieutenant? ... Goddammit.
Key.Chinese: 中尉？…天殺的。
Key.French: Lieutenant ?... Bon sang.
Key.Spanish: ¿Teniente? Maldita sea.
Key.Italian: Tenente? ... Maledizione
Key.Polish: Poruczniku?... Cholera.
Key.Russian: Лейтенант? Черт возьми.
Key.German: Lieutenant? ... Verdammt!
Key.Czech: Poručíku? ... Zatraceně.
Key.English: Lieutenant? ... Goddammit.
Key.Portuguese: Tenente? Puta merda.
Key.Korean: 중위님?... 젠장할.
Key.Chinesesimp: 中尉？...该死。
Key.Japanese: 大尉？…クソッ！
Key.Turkish: Teğmen? ... Lanet olsun.

Container.name: x03_Plane_Destroyed
Container.situation: the airplane is shot down.

Key.Original: Kerry, be advised, we've lost comms with Golf-4-1. Crossroads out.
Key.Chinese: Kerry，請注意，我們和 Golf-4-1 失去聯繫。Crossroads 結束通話。
Key.French: Kerry, l'escouade Golf-4-1 ne répond plus. Crossroads, terminé.
Key.Spanish: Kerry, cuidado, hemos perdido la comunicación con Golf-4-1. Encrucijada, corto.
Key.Italian: Kerry, attenzione, abbiamo perso le comunicazioni con Golf-4-1! Crossroads chiude.
Key.Polish: Kerry, uwaga, straciliśmy łączność z Golfem 4-1. Crossroads, bez odbioru.
Key.Russian: Керри, внимание, мы потеряли связь с Гольфом 4-1. Конец связи.
Key.German: Kerry, Achtung, wir haben den Kontakt zu Golf-4-1 verloren. Crossroads out.
Key.Czech: Kerry, hlásíme, že jsme ztratili spojení s Golfem 4-1. Křižovatka končí.
Key.English: Kerry, be advised, we've lost comms with Golf-4-1. Crossroads out.
Key.Portuguese: Kerry, fique sabendo que perdemos comunicação com Golfo-4-1. Encruzilhada desliga.
Key.Korean: 케리, 골프 넷하나와의 교신이 두절됐다. 크로스로드, 이상.
Key.Chinesesimp: Kerry，请注意，我们与 Golf-4-1 的联络中断。Crossroads 完毕。
Key.Japanese: ケリー、報告する。ゴルフ-4-1との連絡が途絶えた。クロスローズ、以上。
Key.Turkish: Kerry, dikkatine, Golf-4-1 ile iletişimi kaybettik. Crossroads ayrıldı.

Container.name: x01_Out_Of_Ammo
Container.situation: kerry fails to soften enemy forces before the artillery runs out of ammo.

Key.Original: That's it from Delta-3. All units, move in!
Key.Chinese: 那是 Delta-3 發出的訊息。各部隊開始行動！
Key.French: Delta-3 est à court. À toutes les unités, avancez !
Key.Spanish: Delta-3 ha acabado. A todas las unidades, ¡en marcha!
Key.Italian: Questo è tutto da Delta-3. Tutte le unità, avanzate!
Key.Polish: To od Delta 3. Do wszystkich jednostek, ruszamy!
Key.Russian: Вот и все от Дельты-3. Все отрядам - вперед!
Key.German: Das war's von Delta-3. Alle Einheiten, vorrücken!
Key.Czech: To byla Delta 3. Všechny jednotky, pohyb!
Key.English: That's it from Delta-3. All units, move in!
Key.Portuguese: É o sinal de Delta-3. Todas as unidades, avancem!
Key.Korean: 델타 삼의 탄이 떨어졌다. 전 병력, 진입하라!
Key.Chinesesimp: 那来自 Delta-3。所有单元，前进！
Key.Japanese: デルタ-3が弾切れだ。全部隊、移動！
Key.Turkish: Delta-3’ten bu kadar. Tüm birlikler, ilerleyin!

Container.name: i01_Scouting
Container.situation: hq gives kerry tips on how to scout.

Key.Original: Stay alert out there, Kerry. Echo hit them hard, but don't be surprised if you run into some stragglers.
Key.Chinese: 記得保持警戒，Kerry。Echo 讓他們吃了不少苦頭，但你還是有可能碰上落單的敵兵。
Key.French: Ouvrez l'œil, Kerry. Echo a fait le gros du travail, mais ne soyez pas surpris de trouver des survivants.
Key.Spanish: Manténgase alerta, Kerry. Echo ha dado buena cuenta de ellos, pero no se relajen porque quedan rezagados.
Key.Italian: Stai all'erta, Kerry. Echo li ha colpiti duramente, ma non sorprenderti se incontri qualche sbandato.
Key.Polish: Zachowaj czujność, Kerry. Echo nieźle im przywaliło, ale nie zdziw się, jeśli trafisz na jakieś niedobitki.
Key.Russian: Керри, сохраняйте бдительность. Эхо их сильно потрепал, но не удивитесь, если наткнетесь на выживших.
Key.German: Blieben Sie wachsam da draußen, Kerry. Echo hat sie schwer getroffen, aber seien Sie nicht überrascht, wenn Ihnen einige Versprengte begegnen.
Key.Czech: Dávejte si tam pozor, Kerry. Echo je tvrdě zasáhlo, ale nenechte se překvapit, pokud narazíte na nějaké zbytky.
Key.English: Stay alert out there, Kerry. Echo hit them hard, but don't be surprised if you run into some stragglers.
Key.Portuguese: Fique alerta lá fora, Kerry. Eco, ataque com tudo, mas tenha cuidado com possíveis retardatários.
Key.Korean: 주의해라, 케리. 에코가 놈들에게 포격을 퍼부었어도 아직 살아있는 놈들이 있을 수도 있어.
Key.Chinesesimp: 保持警惕，Kerry。Echo 狠狠地打击了他们，不过如果你遇到游兵散勇，别感到意外。
Key.Japanese: 気をつけろ、ケリー。エコーが徹底的に叩きはしたが、敗残兵が残っていてもおかしくない。
Key.Turkish: Orada tetikte ol, Kerry. Echo onları fena vurdu, ancak bazı başıboş hayvanlara rastlarsan şaşırma.

Key.Original: Pay close attention to the hills. They might be doing some recon of their own.
Key.Chinese: 千萬注意山丘的動靜。敵方有可能在進行偵查。
Key.French: Faites bien attention aux collines. Ils ont peut-être des éclaireurs.
Key.Spanish: No pierdan de vista las colinas. Igual están realizando labores de reconocimiento.
Key.Italian: Presta molta attenzione alle colline. Può darsi che stiano eseguendo delle ricognizioni.
Key.Polish: Uważaj na wzgórza. Oni mogą tam przeprowadzać własne rozpoznanie.
Key.Russian: Внимательно следите за холмами. Там могут оказаться вражеские разведчики.
Key.German: Achten Sie besonders auf die Hügel. Möglicherweise führt der Feind auch selbst Aufklärung.
Key.Czech: Dávejte si dobrý pozor na ty kopce. Možná, že taky provádějí průzkum.
Key.English: Pay close attention to the hills. They might be doing some recon of their own.
Key.Portuguese: Preste atenção aos montes. O inimigo também pode estar fazendo reconhecimento.
Key.Korean: 언덕을 잘 살펴봐. 놈들도 정찰을 하고 있을 가능성이 있으니까 말이다.
Key.Chinesesimp: 密切注意山丘。他们也许也在进行侦察。
Key.Japanese: 丘に注意しろ。敵もこちらを偵察しているはずだ。
Key.Turkish: Tepelere çok dikkat et. Kendilerince bir keşif yapıyor olabilirler.

Key.Original: Avoid contact as much as possible. Get to the OP and call out fire missions for Delta. Out.
Key.Chinese: 盡量避免與敵方接觸。就掩護位置，呼叫 Delta 火力支援。結束通話。
Key.French: Évitez les contacts autant que possible. Rejoignez le point d'observation et désignez des cibles à Delta. Terminé.
Key.Spanish: Si pueden, eviten entablar combate. Diríjanse al puesto de vigilancia para pedir a Delta misiones de fuego. Corto.
Key.Italian: Evita il contatto più possibile. Vai al teatro delle operazioni e richiedi missioni di fuoco per Delta.. Chiudo.
Key.Polish: Staraj się unikać kontaktu. Udaj się do OD i wezwij wsparcie ogniowe Delta. Bez odbioru.
Key.Russian: Всеми силами старайтесь избегать боя. Добирайтесь до точки и запрашивайте огонь Дельты. Конец связи.
Key.German: Vermeiden Sie nach Möglichkeit jeden Kontakt. Begeben Sie sich zum Einsatzgebiet und legen Sie Feuermissionen für Delta fest. Out.
Key.Czech: Vyhýbejte se kontaktu, jak to jen půjde. Dostaňte se operační oblasti a hlaste dělostřelecké údery pro tým Delta. Konec.
Key.English: Avoid contact as much as possible. Get to the OP and call out fire missions for Delta. Out.
Key.Portuguese: Evite contato sempre que possível. Vá ao ponto elevado e peça missões de fogo a Delta. Desligo.
Key.Korean: 최대한 교전은 피하도록 해. 관측점으로 가서 델타에게 사격임무를 요청하도록. 이상.
Key.Chinesesimp: 尽可能避免遇敌。前往 OP，呼叫火力支援 Delta。完毕。
Key.Japanese: 接触はできるだけ避けろ。OPに向かい、デルタに砲撃を要請せよ。以上。
Key.Turkish: Mümkün olduğunca temastan kaçın. OP’ye git ve Delta için ateş görevi çağrısında bulun. Tamam.

Container.name: 85_The_End_Of_All_Things
Container.participants: EPC B HQ;EPC B Abstract A;EPC B Member;EPC B Abstract B;EPC B Player;
Container.situation: nato forces collapse under csat's offensive as miller walks away and credits roll.

Key.Original: This is Echo-2-1, confirmed! We're trying to p-
Key.Chinese: 這是 Echo-2-1，確認！我們正打算－
Key.French: Ici Echo-2-1, je confirme ! On essaie d'emp...
Key.Spanish: Aquí Echo-2-1, ¡confirmado! Intentamos...
Key.Italian: Qui è Echo-2-1, confermato! Stiamo cercando di...
Key.Polish: Tu Echo 2-1, potwierdzam! Próbujemy…
Key.Russian: Я Эхо 2-1, подтверждаю! Мы пытаемся...
Key.German: Hier ist Echo-2-1, bestätige! Wir versuchen ...
Key.Czech: Tady je Echo 2-1, potvrzujeme! Pokoušíme se-
Key.English: This is Echo-2-1, confirmed! We're trying to p-
Key.Portuguese: Aqui é Echo-2-1, confirmado! Estamos tentando p-
Key.Korean: 여기는 에코 둘하나, 확인! 놈들을 막아...
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是 Echo-2-1，已确认！我们正设法-
Key.Japanese: こちらエコー-2-1、了解！これより―
Key.Turkish: Echo-2-1 konuşuyor, onaylandı! Yapmaya çalıştığımız-

Key.Original: Crossroads, we're under heavy assault! We can't-
Key.Chinese: Crossroads，遭到重砲攻擊！我們沒－
Key.French: Crossroads, on se fait aligner ! Impossible...
Key.Spanish: Encrucijada, ¡sufrimos un asalto pesado! No podemos...
Key.Italian: Crossroads, siamo sotto assalto pesante! Non possiamo....
Key.Polish: Crossroads, zostaliśmy zaatakowani! Nie możemy…
Key.Russian: Перекресток, нас сильно прижали! Мы не можем...
Key.German: Crossroads, wir sind unter schwerem Beschuss! Wir können nicht ...
Key.Czech: Křižovatko, jsme pod těžkým útokem! Nemůžeme-
Key.English: Crossroads, we're under heavy assault! We can't-
Key.Portuguese: Encruzilhada, estamos sob ataque pesado! Não cons-
Key.Korean: 크로스로드, 거센 공격을 받고 있다! 더 이상...
Key.Chinesesimp: Crossroads，我们受到猛烈攻击！我们不能-
Key.Japanese: クロスローズ、猛攻を受けている！もうこれ以上は―
Key.Turkish: Crossroads, ağır saldırı altındayız! Dayanama-

Key.Original: All units! Multiple hostile aircraft inbound!
Key.Chinese: 各部隊！敵方多架飛行器來襲！
Key.French: À toutes les unités ! Plusieurs unités aériennes ennemies en approche !
Key.Spanish: ¡A todas las unidades! ¡Se acercan múltiples aeronaves hostiles!
Key.Italian: A tutte le unità! Velivoli ostili in arrivo!
Key.Polish: Do wszystkich jednostek! Zbliża się wiele samolotów wroga!
Key.Russian: Всем отрядам! Атакует вражеская авиация!
Key.German: An alle Einheiten! Mehrere feindliche Luftfahrzeuge im Anflug!
Key.Czech: Všechny jednotky! Blíží se několik nepřátelských letounů!
Key.English: All units! Multiple hostile aircraft inbound!
Key.Portuguese: Todas as unidades! Várias aeronaves hostis a caminho!
Key.Korean: 전 병력! 다수의 적 항공기가 접근한다!
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有单元！多架敌军飞机飞来！
Key.Japanese: 全部隊へ！敵航空機が複数、接近中！
Key.Turkish: Tüm birlikler! Birden fazla düşman hava aracı yaklaşıyor!

Key.Original: Copy, 4-1!
Key.French: Reçu, 4-1 !
Key.Spanish: ¡Recibido, 4-1!
Key.Italian: Ricevuto, 4-1!
Key.Polish: Przyjąłem, 4-1!
Key.Russian: Понял, 4-1!
Key.German: Verstanden, 4-1!
Key.Czech: Slyšíme, 4-1!
Key.English: Copy, 4-1!
Key.Portuguese: Copiado, 4-1!
Key.Korean: 알았다, 넷하나!
Key.Turkish: Anlaşıldı, 4-1!

Key.Original: Mayday! Mayday! Golf-4-1 going down!
Key.Chinese: 塔台！塔台！Golf-4-1 即將墜毀！
Key.French: Mayday, mayday, mayday ! Golf-4-1 va au tapis !
Key.Spanish: ¡Mayday! ¡Mayday! ¡Golf-4-1 está cayendo!
Key.Italian: Mayday! Mayday! Golf-4-1 sta precipitando!
Key.Polish: Mayday! Mayday! Golf 4-1 spada!
Key.Russian: SOS! SOS! Гольф 4-1 падает!
Key.German: Mayday! Mayday! Golf-4-1 schmiert ab!
Key.Czech: Mayday! Mayday! Golf 4-1 byl zasažen!
Key.English: Mayday! Mayday! Golf-4-1 going down!
Key.Portuguese: Mayday! Mayday! Golfo-4-1 abatido!
Key.Korean: 메이데이! 메이데이! 골프 넷하나, 추락한다!
Key.Chinesesimp: 求救！求救！Golf-4-1 坠毁！
Key.Japanese: メーデー！メーデー！ゴルフ-4-1、撃墜される！
Key.Turkish: Meydey! Meydey! Golf-4-1 iniyor.

Key.Original: 1-1, say again! Over!
Key.Chinese: 1-1，再說一次！完畢！
Key.French: 1-1, répétez ! À vous !
Key.Spanish: 1-1, ¡repita! ¡Cambio!
Key.Italian: 1-1, ripeti! Passo!
Key.Polish: 1-1, powtórz! Odbiór!
Key.Russian: 1-1, повторите! Прием!
Key.German: 1-1, wiederholen Sie! Over!
Key.Czech: 1-1, opakujte to! Příjem.
Key.English: 1-1, say again! Over!
Key.Portuguese: 1-1, repita! Câmbio!
Key.Korean: 하나하나, 다시 말하라! 이상!
Key.Chinesesimp: 1-1，再说一次！完毕，请回复！
Key.Japanese: 1-1、もう一度頼む！どうぞ！
Key.Turkish: 1-1, tekrar et! Tamam!

Key.Original: All units! All units! Tactical withdrawal! I say again, get your guys out-
Key.Chinese: 各部隊！各部隊！戰術撤退！再說一次，讓你們的人快點撤－
Key.French: À toutes les unités, repli tactique, je répète : faites dégager vos hommes...
Key.Spanish: ¡A todas las unidades! ¡A todas las unidades! ¡Retirada estratégica! Repito: saquen a sus hombres de...
Key.Italian: A tutte le unità! A tutte le unità! Ritirata tattica! Lo ripeto, fai allontanare i tuoi uomini.
Key.Polish: Do wszystkich jednostek! Do wszystkich jednostek! Odwrót taktyczny! Powtarzam, zabierzcie swoich chłopaków.
Key.Russian: Всем отрядам! Всем отрядам! Тактическое отступление! Повторяю, уводите людей...
Key.German: An alle Einheiten! An alle Einheiten! Taktischer Rückzug! Ich wiederhole, schaffen Sie Ihre Männer raus ...
Key.Czech: Všem jednotkám! Všem jednotkám! Taktický ústup! Opakuji, dostaňte svoje muže pryč-
Key.English: All units! All units! Tactical withdrawal! I say again, get your guys out-
Key.Portuguese: Todas as unidades! Todas as unidades! Retirada tática! Repito, tire os seus homens-
Key.Korean: 전 병력! 전 병력! 전술적 퇴각이다! 반복한다, 다들 여기서 빠져...
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有单元！所有单元！战术撤退！我再说一次，把你们的人撤出来-
Key.Japanese: 全部隊へ！全部隊へ！戦術的撤退を！繰り返す、全部隊、逃げ―
Key.Turkish: Tüm birlikler! Tüm birlikler! Taktiksel geri çekilme! Tekrar ediyorum, adamlarınızı çıkarın-

Container.name: 80_Return
Container.situation: miller decides to help kerry.

Key.Original: I'll tell you what.
Key.Chinese: 我跟你說。
Key.French: Voilà ce que je vous propose.
Key.Spanish: Quiero que sepa una cosa.
Key.Italian: Ti dico una cosa.
Key.Polish: Coś ci powiem.
Key.Russian: Я вот что скажу.
Key.German: Ich sage Ihnen was.
Key.Czech: Něco vám řeknu.
Key.English: I'll tell you what.
Key.Portuguese: Quer saber?
Key.Korean: 뭐 하나 알려주지.
Key.Chinesesimp: 听我告诉你。
Key.Japanese: こうしよう。
Key.Turkish: Bak ne diyeceğim.

Key.Original: I like you, Kerry. I'll be back in an hour. If you're still here, I'll give you a way out.
Key.Chinese: 我看好你，Kerry。我一小時內就回來。如果那時候你還在這，我就放你一條生路。
Key.French: Je vous aime bien, Kerry. Je reviens dans une heure. Si vous êtes encore là, je vous ferai quitter la zone.
Key.Spanish: Me cae bien, Kerry. Volveré en una hora. Si todavía sigue aquí, seré su billete de salida.
Key.Italian: Mi piaci, Kerry. Torno tra un'ora. Se sei ancora qui, ti procurerò una via d'uscita.
Key.Polish: Lubię cię, Kerry. Wrócę za godzinę. Jeśli tu będziesz, pomogę ci.
Key.Russian: Вы мне нравитесь, Керри. Я вернусь через час. Если будете здесь, я вас выведу.
Key.German: Ich mag Sie, Kerry. Ich bin in einer Stunde wieder da. Wenn Sie dann noch da sind, bringe ich Sie raus.
Key.Czech: Líbíte se mi, Kerry. Za hodinku se vrátím. Pokud tady ještě budete, nabídnu vám možnost, jak z toho ven.
Key.English: I like you, Kerry. I'll be back in an hour. If you're still here, I'll give you a way out.
Key.Portuguese: Gosto de você, Kerry. Vou voltar em uma hora. Se você ainda estiver vivo, vou tirá-lo daqui.
Key.Korean: 난 네가 마음에 들어, 케리. 난 한 시간 후에 돌아올 거다. 그 때도 네가 여기 있다면, 여기서 나가게 해주마.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我喜欢你，Kerry。我将在一小时之内回来。如果你还在这，我会给你一条出路。
Key.Japanese: 私はおまえが気に入っている。…数時間後に戻る。そのとき、まだここにいたら、脱出させてやろう。
Key.Turkish: Seni seviyorum, Kerry. Bir saat içinde döneceğim. Hâlâ buradaysan sana bir çıkış bulacağım.

Key.Original: Things are about to get ugly. I'd suggest you keep your head down.
Key.Chinese: 現在開始要見真章了。建議你保持低調。
Key.French: Ça va bientôt tourner au vinaigre ici. Je vous conseille de faire profil bas.
Key.Spanish: Las cosas se van a poner feas. Les aconsejo que mantengan la cabeza gacha.
Key.Italian: Le cose stanno per mettersi male. Consiglio di tenere la testa bassa.
Key.Polish: Niedługo zrobi się gorąco. Lepiej się ukryj.
Key.Russian: Скоро тут начнется жара. Советую вам не высовываться.
Key.German: Die Sache wird jetzt nämlich hässlich. Ich schlage vor, Sie ziehen den Kopf ein.
Key.Czech: Bude to tady ošklivé. Doporučuji nevystrkovat hlavu.
Key.English: Things are about to get ugly. I'd suggest you keep your head down.
Key.Portuguese: O bicho vai pegar. Recomendo não atrair atenção.
Key.Korean: 상황이 좀 더러워질 거야. 내가 너라면 총 맞지 않게 조심할 거다.
Key.Chinesesimp: 局势将会变得不妙。我建议你把头压低。
Key.Japanese: 状況は悪化しつつある。悪いことは言わん、身を低くしていろ。
Key.Turkish: İşler çirkinleşmek üzere. Dikkatleri üzerinize çekmemenizi öneririm.

Container.name: 75_CSAT_Inbound
Container.situation: csat begin their attack due to kerry's actions.

Key.Original: All units, we've got multiple unknown contacts approaching the northern coast.
Key.Chinese: 各部隊，北方海岸發現多個未知實體。
Key.French: À toutes les unités, plusieurs contacts inconnus approchent de la côte nord.
Key.Spanish: A todas las unidades, detectamos múltiples elementos desconocidos aproximándose a la costa.
Key.Italian: A tutte le unità: numerosi contatti ignoti in arrivo dalla costa settentrionale.
Key.Polish: Do wszystkich jednostek, od północnego wybrzeża zbliża się wiele nieznanych kontaktów.
Key.Russian: Всем отрядам, к северному берегу приближаются неопознанные войска.
Key.German: An alle Einheiten, mehrere unbekannte Kontakte nähern sich der nördlichen Küste.
Key.Czech: Všechny jednotky, k severnímu pobřeží se blíží několik neznámých kontaktů.
Key.English: All units, we've got multiple unknown contacts approaching the northern coast.
Key.Portuguese: Todas as unidades, há vários contatos desconhecidos se aproximando pela costa norte.
Key.Korean: 전 병력, 북쪽 해안으로 알 수 없는 다수의 병력이 출현했다.
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有单元，有多名不明身份的人逼近北部海岸。
Key.Japanese: 全部隊へ、未確認の敵が複数、北部海岸に接近中。
Key.Turkish: Tüm birlikler, kuzey kıyısından yaklaşan birden fazla bilinmeyen temas var.

Key.Original: Standby. We might have a problem here.
Key.Chinese: 做好準備。可能會出亂子。
Key.French: Restez en stand-by. On risque d'avoir un problème.
Key.Spanish: Permanezcan a la espera. Igual tenemos un problema.
Key.Italian: Restate in standby. Potrebbe esserci un problema.
Key.Polish: Zaczekaj. Mamy tu problem.
Key.Russian: Ждите. У нас, кажется, проблема.
Key.German: Bleiben Sie in Bereitschaft. Wir kriegen möglicherweise ein Problem.
Key.Czech: Čekejte. Možná, že máme problém.
Key.English: Standby. We might have a problem here.
Key.Portuguese: Aguarde. Acho que temos um problema aqui.
Key.Korean: 대기하라. 문제가 생긴 걸 수도 있다.
Key.Chinesesimp: 待命。我们这儿可能有个问题。
Key.Japanese: 待機せよ。問題発生の可能性あり。
Key.Turkish: Beklemede kal. Burada sorun yaşayabiliriz.

Container.name: 70_Miller
Container.situation: kerry meets with miller. miller tells him what has been going on.

Key.Original: Miller.
Key.Chinese: Miller。
Key.French: Miller.
Key.Spanish: Miller.
Key.Italian: Miller.
Key.Polish: Miller.
Key.Russian: Миллер.
Key.German: Miller.
Key.Czech: Millere.
Key.English: Miller.
Key.Portuguese: Miller.
Key.Korean: 밀러 대위 나으리.
Key.Chinesesimp: Miller。
Key.Japanese: ミラー。
Key.Turkish: Miller.

Key.Original: Old habits die hard.
Key.Chinese: 積習難改。
Key.French: La force de l'habitude.
Key.Spanish: Mala hierba nunca muere.
Key.Italian: Le vecchie abitudini sono dure a morire.
Key.Polish: Ciężko się pozbyć starych nawyków.
Key.Russian: От старых привычек трудно избавиться.
Key.German: Der Mensch ist eben ein Gewohnheitstier.
Key.Czech: Zvyk je železná košile.
Key.English: Old habits die hard.
Key.Portuguese: Você não muda.
Key.Korean: 제 버릇이 어디 가겠나요?
Key.Chinesesimp: 积习难改啊。
Key.Japanese: 古いクセってのは、直らんものさ。
Key.Turkish: Can çıkar huy çıkmaz.

Key.Original: Not so fast. I think you owe me some answers.
Key.Chinese: 先別急。你欠我一些答案。
Key.French: Pas si vite. Vous me devez quelques réponses.
Key.Spanish: No tan rápido. Creo que me debe algunas respuestas.
Key.Italian: Non così in fretta. Mi devi delle risposte.
Key.Polish: Nie tak szybko. Chyba jesteś mi winny kilka odpowiedzi.
Key.Russian: Не так быстро. Я думаю, вы должны мне кое-что объяснить.
Key.German: Nicht so schnell. Sie schulden mir einige Antworten.
Key.Czech: Ne tak rychle. Myslím, že mi dlužíte nějaké odpovědi.
Key.English: Not so fast. I think you owe me some answers.
Key.Portuguese: Não tão rápido. Você me deve umas respostas.
Key.Korean: 벌써 가실 수야 없죠. 저한테 몇 가지 대답을 좀 해주시고 가시죠?
Key.Chinesesimp: 别那么快。我认为你欠我一些回答。
Key.Japanese: まあそう急ぐな。質問タイムといこうか。
Key.Turkish: Bu kadar hızlı değil. Sanırım bana bazı cevapları borçlusun.

Key.Original: Ah, Kerry. You certainly do have the tendency to show up unexpectedly.
Key.Chinese: 哦，Kerry。你習慣出奇不意跳出來哦。
Key.French: Ah, Kerry. Vous avez le chic pour vous pointer quand on ne s'y attend pas.
Key.Spanish: Ah, Kerry. Realmente tiene el don de la sorpresa.
Key.Italian: Ah, Kerry. Hai la tendenza a comparire inaspettatamente.
Key.Polish: Ach, Kerry. Masz skłonność do pojawiania się w nieoczekiwanych momentach.
Key.Russian: А, Керри. Любите вы появляться, когда не ждут.
Key.German: Ah, Kerry. Sie neigen wirklich dazu, unerwartet aufzutauchen.
Key.Czech: Ach, Kerry. Nedá se upřít, že máte sklon objevovat se nečekaně.
Key.English: Ah, Kerry. You certainly do have the tendency to show up unexpectedly.
Key.Portuguese: Ah, Kerry. Você e essa sua tendência de aparecer sem aviso.
Key.Korean: 아, 케리. 넌 확실히 예상치 못했던 때에 튀어나오는 버릇이 있군.
Key.Chinesesimp: 哦，Kerry。你真的有突然出现的习惯。
Key.Japanese: ああ、ケリーか。おまえはいつも、予想外のタイミングで私の前に現れる。
Key.Turkish: Ah, Kerry. Kesinlikle beklenmedik anda ortaya çıkmaya meyillisin.

Key.Original: This is what it's all been about, isn't it? Stratis, Mike-26, the airport, everything.
Key.Chinese: 從頭到尾都是為了這個，對吧？Stratis、Mike-26、機場的事、全部。
Key.French: C'est ça qui a tout déclenché, pas vrai ? Stratis, Mike-26, l'aéroport, tout.
Key.Spanish: De modo que esto le da sentido a todo, ¿verdad? Stratis, Mike-26, el aeropuerto... a todo.
Key.Italian: Si è sempre trattato di questo, vero? Stratis, Mike-26, l'aeroporto, tutto.
Key.Polish: A więc o to chodziło w tym wszystkim, tak? Stratis, Mike-26, lotnisko, wszystko.
Key.Russian: В этом и был весь смысл, да? Стратис, Майк-26, аэродром - все это.
Key.German: Darum ging's bei der ganzen Sache, stimmt's? Stratis, Mike-26, der Flughafen, alles.
Key.Czech: O to celou dobu šlo, že? Stratis, Mike-26, letiště, všechno.
Key.English: This is what it's all been about, isn't it? Stratis, Mike-26, the airport, everything.
